title: Palm Tree
Description: Palm trees need consistently moist soil that doesn't become waterlogged (so a pot with good drainage is essential). Light One of the reasons palm plants are such common houseplants is that they can easily adapt to low-light conditions. Most palms are tolerant of (or prefer) shade and may fail to thrive if they receive too much direct sunlight. Water Palms grow best in slightly sandy soils with ample drainage. Never let a palm's root ball sit in water and allow the plant's soil to dry out in between waterings. 10inch pot 5.5ft tall

title: ZZ Plant - Small
Description: Approx: 11”h x 4”w The ZZ plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia) is a popular, low-maintenance houseplant known for its attractive, glossy, dark green foliage and tolerance to a wide range of growing conditions. Native to East Africa, it thrives in dry, low-light environments, making it an excellent choice for indoor spaces like offices, bedrooms, and living rooms. ZZ plant is efficient in removing harmful contaminants such as formaldehyde, benzene, xylene, trichloroethylene, toluene and carbon dioxide from the air. This aspect gives this plant an upper hand and a good place in bedrooms/offices. These plants are highly preferred for their forgiving nature. ZZ is extremely easy to care for and can survive dry soil, excessive pruning and low light conditions. They can also tolerate changes in temperature and humidity.

title: Trial by Trolley
Description: Cyanide & Happiness started out as cartoons that were both funny and adorable. Now, it’s turned into a tabletop game that 3-13 players can enjoy together as they try to determine who the trolley murderer is! How To Play: Choose one of your friends to be the conductor and have the rest of the players break into two teams. Each track will require an “innocent card” that each team will play. You’ll also try to sabotage each other with “guilty cards”. The main point of the game is to sway the conductor to be on your side. Whichever side he decides against, that’s the track he’ll take and murder you. Includes: 520 game cards 200 innocent cards 150 guilty cards 175 modifier cards 26 death tokens Paper mat Instructions Ages: 14+

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets™ Collection Dobby™ Ornament With Light and Sound
Description: Details Relive the mystery and adventure that fills Harry Potter's second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry with this Christmas tree ornament. Dobby, the mischievous but well-meaning House Elf, will stop at nothing—including causing a huge disturbance to get Harry locked in his bedroom at the Dursleys—to keep his friend from returning to Hogwarts where he predicts disaster will strike. Plastic Christmas ornament features hanger attachment. Includes: One Keepsake Ornament in gift box for easy gift giving, preservation and storage. title: [Midnight & Bloom] Candle
Description: Soy & Coconut wax Candle Indulge in the enchanting allure of "Midnight & Bloom," where the mystery of night meets the delicate beauty of a secret garden. This captivating candle weaves together the deep, velvety essence of dark roses with the warm, resinous notes of labdanum. Perfect for creating an atmosphere of elegant intrigue and serene sophistication, "Midnight & Bloom" is your companion for quiet moments and dreamy nights. Key Notes Top: Pink Peppercorn, Grapefruit, PlumMiddle: Black Rose, CuminBase: Vanilla, Patchouli, Labdanum SCENT STRENGTH: Moderate MOOD: Heady, Radiant, Rich Contains Essential Oils of Lemon from Taiwan & USA, Cedarwood from China, Pepper Seed from India, Patchouli from Indonesia Candle Care + Safety Never leave a burning candle unattended. Extinguish all candles when you leave a room. Trim the wick to 1/4 inch each time the candle is lit. This helps prevent the flame from getting too high. Don't place a burning candle near clothing, books, curtains or anything flammable. Keep lit candles away from drafts, ceiling fans and any air currents. Always place your candle on a stable, heat-resistant surface. A candle should not be burned for more than four hours at a time. Don’t burn a candle all the way down. For a margin of safety, discontinue burning a candle when 1/2 inch of wax remains in the container. PRODUCT DETAILS Volume: 8 ozDiameter: 2 3/8 inHeight: 3 3/8 inBurn time: Up to 45 – 55 hours WAXWe want your home to be a toxin-free zone, which is why we’re conscious of our ingredients. Every hand-poured candle is made with a blend of coconut and soy wax, and is gluten free, toxin free, paraben free, phthalate free, cruelty free, and comes from renewable sources. WICKSWe use eco-friendly, clean-burning, hand-crafted wooden wicks made from FSC Certified Wood. Our wooden wicks burn beautifully, and crackle as if you were sitting next to your own mini fire! FRAGRANCEOur collection of clean, phthalate-free fragrance oils are unique, sophisticated and created using fine fragrance oils + pure essential oils from around the globe. How To Use Wooden wicks are a little different from traditional cotton wicks – they burn longer, cleaner, and have a cozy crackling ambiance. However, they do require a bit of extra care. Here are our tips to get the most out of your new candle: When lighting your candle for the first time, light the wick where the wax meets the wick for several seconds – not at the top of the wick. Always trim your wick before each use, to 1/4 of an inch, and remove all charred wood from previous burns. If the wick is too long, the wax will not pull up the wick and the wick will extinguish. Allow the melt pool to reach the edges of the container before extinguishing – this helps prevent tunnelling, which can impact how well the candle burns. If when burning the candle for a long period of time you notice the flame height getting too high, it may be necessary to trim your wick down. The flame will then return to its proper optimal height.

Description: FRUDIA's Blueberry Hydrating Honey Lip Balm delivers intense hydration and nourishment to dry, chapped lips. Infused with a powerful blend of natural oils including Grape Seed, Mango Seed, and Apricot Kernel, alongside Hydrolyzed Collagen and Honey Extract, this balm ensures your lips stay soft, smooth, and moisturized. Rich in antioxidants from Blueberry Fruit Extract and fortified with Hyaluronic Acid, it helps to lock in moisture, providing long-lasting comfort and a subtle shine. Ideal for daily use, this gentle formula soothes and revitalizes your lips with every application Paraben-free Sulfate-free Silicone-free Apply a moderate amount of the FRUDIA Blueberry Hydrating Honey Lip Balm to the lips and gently massage along the lip line. title: Jade Plant
Description: The Jade Plant (Crassula ovata), also known as the Lucky Plant or Money Plant, is a resilient succulent native to South Africa. With its thick, fleshy, oval-shaped leaves and sturdy stems, it is often associated with good fortune and prosperity. Indoors, it grows slowly and can reach up to 3 feet tall, developing a miniature tree-like appearance over time.SIZE: Dimensions (including pot): Approx. 10.5" x 8" x 8" ; Pot width: 7". Pot style shown in picture LIKES: Thrives in bright, indirect light but can tolerate some direct sun. Prefers warm temperatures and dry conditions, making it an excellent low-maintenance houseplant. DISLIKES: Overwatering is the biggest threat—too much moisture can cause root rot. Also dislikes cold drafts and prolonged exposure to low light, which can lead to weak growth. HEALTH BENEFITS: Helps improve indoor air quality by absorbing carbon dioxide at night. It also adds a calming and aesthetically pleasing touch to any space. WATERING AND FEEDING: Water sparingly, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings. During the growing season (spring and summer), feed with a diluted succulent fertilizer once a month. Reduce watering in winter when growth slows. LIVING WITH PETS AND CHILDREN: Mildly toxic if ingested, so keep it out of reach of pets and small children. Ingestion may cause mild stomach upset.

title: Monstera Plant
Description: The Monstera (Monstera deliciosa), also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a tropical beauty native to the rainforests of Central and South America. Its large, glossy leaves develop dramatic splits and holes as they mature, giving it a signature jungle-like appearance. Indoors, it can grow several feet tall, making it a stunning statement piece. SIZE: Dimensions (including pot): Approx. 17.5" x 13.5" x 16.5" ; Pot width: 7". Pot style shown in picture LIKES: Loves bright, indirect light but can adapt to lower light conditions. Prefers warmth and humidity, similar to its native tropical environment. DISLIKES: Doesn’t appreciate prolonged direct sunlight, which can scorch its leaves. Also dislikes soggy soil—too much water can lead to root rot. HEALTH BENEFITS: Helps improve indoor air quality by filtering toxins like formaldehyde and benzene. Also adds a lush, calming presence to any space. WATERING AND FEEDING: Water when the top few inches of soil feel dry. It enjoys a good soak but doesn’t like standing water. Feed with a balanced liquid fertilizer once a month during the growing season for optimal growth. LIVING WITH PETS AND CHILDREN: Toxic if ingested, so keep it out of reach of curious pets and small children. Its sap can also cause mild skin irritation.

title: Prize Dutch Tulip Collection
Description: Give Your Home a Touch of the Dutch Our Prize Dutch Tulip Collection features six fabulous varieties. These Dutch-grown bulbs will fill your spring garden with weeks of classic blooms in a rainbow of solid colours. When they flower, you and your visitors will know spring has truly arrived!From Our Home to YoursMany of our American friends who visit Holland to enjoy our incredible tulip fields have told us the same thing: They want tulips just as splendid and beautiful to grow in their own gardens. They cannot get enough of these regal plants with their large and showy flowers that open in such gorgeous hues.So our Dutch bulb experts worked with the top growers in The Netherlands to assemble the Breck's Prize Dutch Tulip Collection, which features the most iconic varieties bred to flourish in U.S. gardens. The result is a selection of appealing and robust tulips that will, quite frankly, transform your landscape. We believe you will cherish the magnificent tulips in this collection as much as the ones you adored in Holland!Includes 8 each of Apeldoorn, Golden Apeldoorn, Queen of Night, Negrita, The Ice Princess and Pink Ardour. Apeldoorn: Regarded as the finest red tulip in cultivation, Apeldoorn is breathtaking. Its tall stems support large, 5" flowers of cherry red with a touch of black at their base. Grows 24–26" tall. Golden Apeldoorn: Strong stems carry blooms that are the colour of pure sunshine. Plant in groups along walkways to welcome visitors with style. A natural choice for arrangements. Grows 24–26" tall. Queen of Night: Extremely deep maroon blooms can appear pitch black in certain lighting. Provides sensational contrast in borders and arrangements. Flowers are large and long lasting. Grows 28–30" tall. Negrita: Vibrant dark purple blooms add real drama to springtime borders.These large flowers are lightly fragrant and long lasting. Excellent in borders and cut-flower displays. Grows 18" tall. The Ice Princess: Majestic, pointed, ivory-white blooms with creamy flame accents. Giant, 4–5" long-lasting flowers on very sturdy stems will be a highlight in the garden and in spring arrangements. Grows 18-20” tall. Pink Ardour: Vibrant, oversized tulips that can grow up to 5" across, ensuring they capture attention in any springtime garden. Robust stems carry the neon pink flowers, making these tulips ideal for creating eye-catching borders or enriching cutting gardens, especially when planted in clusters. Grows 16-18” tall.

title: White Cap Peony
Description: A truly unique Japanese-style peony!Bright, beetroot-coloured petals cup a centre of buff-hued petaloids that fade to white as the flowers open wide. One of the most succulently scented peonies, as well as one of the strongest—no staking needed. Winner of the APS Gold Medal and Award of Landscape Merit.

title: Flaming Beauties™ Tulip Collection
Description: Fire Up Your Spring Garden!Set your landscape ablaze in colour with the five fabulous varieties in our new Flaming Beauties Tulip Collection! The petals of each flamboyant flower has the distinctive, contrasting streaks referred to as "flames." Our Dutch bulb experts created this tulip assortment to display a kaleidoscope of colour in the garden--an ever-changing display of hues as the flowers mature.Flamed tulips look spectacular when planted together in border fronts or large groups. For best performance and colouration, grow them where they'll receive at least some sunlight: alongside walkways, beneath deciduous trees, or next to your porch or patio. Be sure to save some for the cutting garden, too. Wherever you use these vibrant varieties, the neighbours are sure to notice! Tulipmania and Flamed TulipsIn the early 1600s, a frenzy of tulip bulb buying and selling called Tulipmania swept through Holland. It started when growers started noticing that a fraction of the bulbs they'd planted, instead of producing monochromatic flowers, inexplicably yielded blooms that "broke" into colourful streaks and flames. People were so taken by these rare "broken" tulips that the bulbs fetched enormous sums of money.We now know that a virus caused those gorgeous splashes of colour 400years ago. The varieties in our Flaming Beauties Tulip Collection were carefully bred to mimic those patterns, and are 100% healthy and vigorous!Includes 5 each of the following tulip varieties: Lemon Meringue: This graceful Rembrandt type produces white-streaked, lemon-yellow blooms that, despite their subtle colouration, illuminate any garden! Classic cup-shaped flowers make gorgeous arrangements. Grows 18" tall. Princess Irene: With a colour palette that's fit for royalty, this award winner features brilliant orange petals with deep purple flames. Its regal flowers are ideal for fresh bouquets. Grows 14-16" tall. Carnaval de Rio: As colourful and splashy as the Brazilian festival it's named for, this tulip yields outsize, deeply cut, white blooms that flaunt scarlet-red flames. Stuns in mass plantings and vases. Grows 16-18" tall. Flaming Flag: Professional growers love Flaming Flag's staying power as a cut flower. The striking, 3½-4" blooms have the classic tulip shape but striking colouration--snow white petals with streaks of rich purple. Grows 14-16" tall. Rainbow Parrot: A fragrant and lavish variety, its feathery form is highlighted by splashes of yellow, green and rich brownish red. Plant in a seasonal border or use as a striking addition to fresh-cut arrangements. Grows 12-14" tall.

title: Flower Support Rings - set of 3

title: Frill Seekers Ruffled Reblooming Daylily Mixture
Description: A blend of our most colourful ruffled rebloomers.These hardy daylilies with frilled edges deliver a second flush of summer flowers just when borders begin to fade. title: Woodstock Fragrant Giant Hyacinth
Description: Enjoy unique rich colour and luscious scent.Unusually high floret counts create full, fluffy flower clusters in a vibrant maroon hue. Delightful for indoor forcing. title: Whale Shark Giant Snow Crocus
Description: Yields an abundance of flowers and naturalizes well.Unveiling a tapestry of the deep sea on land, this bloom presents a striking harmony of colours. title: Rosy Jane Gaura
Description: Lovely white blooms are outlined in pink! Long, slender stems carry butterfly-shaped picotee blossoms that seem to take flight when whipped by the wind. Each stalk yields over 20 of the delicate-looking, pollinator-friendly flowers throughout the summer months. This hardy, drought-tolerant perennial thrives in sunny borders, where its slender stems get support. Deer resistant and unfussy, it makes a charming addition to any garden. Best paired with other perennials for a vibrant, effortless look.

title: Zeba Lily
Description: Enormous blooms!Its gigantic, 30–35 cm flowers are greenish white with large, deep red centres. An excellent perennializer that’s an attention-getter for humans and butterflies alike.

title: Wooden Nesting Nativity

Created so that each hewn piece fits neatly inside the other, the three pieces can also be slightly separated to give the sculpture more depth. Made of natural mango wood and given a neutral color scheme, it easily fits in with any décor. Makes a wonderful gift for a favorite Sunday School teacher, beloved relative or cherished friend. EXCLUSIVE (19cm h, 24cm w, 2 1/2cm d)

title: Iron Cross Shamrock
Description: Eye-catching foliage and months of blooms.This low-growing charmer stands out with distinctive green, heart-shaped leaves marked by a deep maroon cross at their centres. From early summer into the start of autumn, it sends up clusters of bright pink, funnel-shaped blooms, adding colour and character to borders, containers or ground-cover plantings. Deer tend to avoid it, but butterflies and bees won’t. A striking and dependable option for sun-dappled spots and decorative pots alike.

title: Chic and Showy Gladiolus Mixture
Description: Pollinator magnets with a designer look.With its bold palette of purple, green and yellow, this exclusive blend delivers serious visual impact in garden beds and floral arrangements alike. Each bulb produces tall, pollinator-friendly blooms that butterflies, bees and hummingbirds can’t resist. Perfect for adding structure at the back of a sunny border. Varieties are not individually labeled.

title: Michael's Flower
Description: Enchanting flower brings sweet honey scent outdoors.Create a charming woodland scene with this award winner that produces up to five bell-shaped blooms per stem, each featuring distinctive burgundy-purple petals elegantly trimmed in bright yellow. The honey-scented flowers dangle gracefully downward, making them perfect for naturalizing along pathways, in dappled woodland settings or peeking out between rocks in a garden border. A true breakthrough in hybridization, Michael’s Flower thrives in full to partial sun and grows up to 25 cm tall. Plant these easy-care bulbs in groups where their sweet perfume can be appreciated, such as near garden benches or along frequently traveled paths. Fritillaria michailovskyi

title: Speedwell Mixture
Description: Tidy, no-fuss plants pack a floral punch.A versatile blend of pink, white and blue blooms brings lasting summer colour to beds, borders and containers. These tidy, upright plants grow to about 45–60 cm tall and produce long, branching flower spikes that are great for cutting. Their bright green, lanceshaped leaves keep things looking fresh even when the flowers are done. Perennial by nature, they return year after year in average to moist soils. Varieties are not individually labeled.

title: Snowtip Daffodil

Here’s a compact daffodil that enchants with its distinctive snow-white flecking along the deeply frilled rim of its yellow-green cup, creating a delicate frosted effect that inspired its name. The large 11 cm blooms feature soft greenish-yellow petals surrounding a bowl-shaped corona, while their sweet fragrance adds another dimension of garden pleasure.

title: Bellabombe Daffodil
Description: Big, double and ruffled blooms in soft, warm tones.Introducing a lush, showstopping daffodil that’s perfect for brightening pathways, foundation plantings and fresh cut arrangements. Bellabombe’s lightly fragrant, 8–9 cm wide flowers blend yellow, cream and salmon-peach tones, adding rich texture and a lovely scent everywhere it is used. Easy to grow and long lasting, this new double daffodil is an excellent naturalizer, returning each spring and spreading over time.

title: Violet Beauty Allium
Description: Long-lasting blooms give way to equally lovely seed heads.This sweetly fragrant flower blooms in late spring and produces round, 10-15 cm, violet-purple flowers on tall, sturdy stems. They are easy to grow and add height and structure to perennial borders and beds. Makes superb cut and dried flowers. Not only are alliums rabbit and deer resistant, they deter all plant-eating rodents! A great choice for perennializing.

title: National Velvet Tulip
Description: Luxuriant velvet blooms bring timeless garden beauty. Resplendent in deep crimson-red, these sophisticated tulips create an unforgettable mid-spring display with their sumptuous, velvety petals that beg to be touched. Rising gracefully up to 50 cm tall on strong stems that resist wind and rain, National Velvet produces long-lasting blooms that work wonderfully in both formal garden settings and naturalistic designs. Plant en masse along pathways where their rich colour can be appreciated up close, or group them in large clusters near contrasting yellow or white flowers. These tulip make exceptional cut blooms, holding their regal bearing in arrangements for up to 10 days.

title: Twist of Sheree Tall Bearded Iris
Description: It's well-branched habit produces a bevy of blooms. Deep, heavily saturated purple-red falls contrast with bright white standards edged in a slightly lavender hue.

title: Van Eijk Tulip Mixture
Description: All these vigorous varieties bloom at the same time!For this harmonious mix, we use vigorous, long-stemmed perennial tulips, which are deep rosepink i nfused w ith p urple, a l ovely coral-pink tulip with hints of darker pink and apricot, and a pretty blend of orange, pink and red. These colourful, egg-shaped blooms reach up to 15 cm in size. Excellent perennializers, they will return year after year, and in greater numbers.

title: Valentine® Old-Fashioned Bleeding Heart

title: Jellycat Bashful Monkey Medium
Description: Jellycat Monkey Medium is no ordinary teacher. Her geography lessons are more waterfalls and volcano re-enactments than boring chalk and talk.She once led a school trip into a mangrove swamp and called it “immersive learning.” Students love her wild tangents, passion for contour maps and globe-side naps. When class is out, she’s busy trading travel tales with Clyde Capybara or planning the next adventure. LIMIT OF 112.2 x 4.7 x 3.5 inchesSitting height 9 inchesSuitable from birth86 degree Fahrenheit wash only. Do not tumble dry, dry clean, or iron

title: Bashful Beige Bunny Little
Description: Say hello to the sweet little hopper that began it all: the one and only Bashful Beige Bunny Little.This soft plush bunny is a loyal friend and cheerful companion who always sees the sunny side. With velvety fur and personalizable floppy ears available in different fonts and thread colours, she’s a unique gift for someone one of a kind.She’s also a wonderful listener, and if you’re lucky, this cuddly stuffed bunny might just whisper back. LIMIT OF 17.1 x 3.5 x 3.1 inchesSitting height 5 inchesSuitable from birth 86 degree Fahrenheit wash only. Do not tumble dry, dry clean, or iron

Don’t settle for generic flower arrangements at your next event – make it truly special with the Cocktail Arrangement. Votive vase included. Price is per single arrangement.

Perfect for adding a touch of color and beauty to your special day or any other occasion. The unique color combination lends itself perfectly to any environment. No matter what your theme- from modern style to boho chic - our bud vase arrangement won’t disappoint.Let us help you turn your ideas into reality! With our bud vase arrangement. Select 4 and create a semi-circle of love to surround you during your ceremony, have two at the entrance to your aisle or mark your guests rows with the lush floral pieces. Re-purpose throughout your reception anywhere you see fit! Photography: NIkki Hollett Photography

Description: Send classic beauty with our gorgeous Garden Whites Bouquet! Featuring an array of white flowers, from white roses to creamy accents and greenery, this bouquet is sure to make your recipient feel special.Embrace the timelessness of nature with our garden-style floral design. The Garden Whites Bouquet brings that same sense of classic beauty with white blooms fit for any occasion. Whether you're looking to send thoughts of sympathy, a unique housewarming present or the perfect way to express your love to a special someone, or that random person who sent you a kind text message last week! Perfect for a variety of occasions, the Cutie Patootie is sure to provide long-lasting beauty, with minimal scent ensuring lasting enjoyment. This amazing bouquet comes ready-arranged, so all you have to do is pick it up or have flowers delivered anywhere in Greater Vancouver directly to their door. The Cutie Patootie – a gift that delights every time! We select the ingredients based on quality and seasonality, so ingredients & colours may vary slightly. Size Large (shown).

Description: Our Designer's Choice arrangement features our favourite seasonal flowers and foliage, designed in a vase for a more custom look and high end feel. Designed in a vase offers a ready to gift arrangement for your recipient to place and enjoy. Colours and flower choice vary more than our classic handtied. Ingredients vary based on quality and seasonality and each bouquet is one-of-a-kind. Sizes: (all arrangements COME WITH VASE) Standard: $150Large:$250 *photos are for size reference. Colour pallet and flower choice will vary. When ordering a 'designer's choice' you agree to remain flexible in colour (ie. bright, moody, pastel) and flowers.

title: Classic Handtied Bouquet
Description: Are you looking for that special bouquet? Our Classic Handtied Bouquet is sure to fit the bill! This quaint and beautiful bouquet is made with lovely pastel blooms – always roses – of the highest quality. Gathered freshly from local farms whenever possible, each bloom has been specially-selected just for you! Your package will arrive in an upright delivery box filled with water, ensuring your blooms remain lusciously hydrated during their journey.Whether it’s a gift of love, an act of appreciation, or simply a gesture of friendship, this handcrafted bundle of joy is perfect for any occasion. Send to one you cherish most to express sentiment and emotion the right way — no better way than through flowers! Stay connected with loved ones near or far than with a Classic Handtied Bouquet fresh from your local flower shop?! Looking for something more monochromatic? Check out our Garden Whites Bouquet. Available in 3 sizes Small: 8-10 stems $55 Medium: 12-15 stems $75 Large:18-20 stems $95

Olfco’s dried bouquet features long stems of dried flowers and foliage in natural colours, spiced up with grasses palms, and pampas. Ingredients may vary slightly, as the flowers we select depend on quality and seasonality, so each dried bouquet is one-of-a-kind. Olfco uses only compostable packaging and our bouquets are delivered in an upright box with a complimentary handwritten note. All products will come with basic care instructions. 2 Sizes: Mini: $45Standard: $75

title: Wild Thing Bouquet
Description: Send a little bit of wilderness—and show them you’re thinking of them! The Wild Thing bouquet is crafted with natural foliage and organic texture, and sprinkled with wildflowers and eucalpytus foliage. Each stem comes freshly cut from handpicked blooms from our local farms wherever possible, so you know you’re getting the freshest, most beautiful arrangements. Nothing adds a bit comfort quite like an overflowing bouquet, and The Wild Thing does just that. It's perfect for bringing the outside into any space or for sending as a thoughtful gift for loved ones near and far. Whatever your reason, why not go a bit wild this season? Ingredients vary based on quality and seasonality and each bouquet is one-of-a-kind. Available in 3 Sizes: Small:13-15 stems $55 Medium: 18-20 stems $80 Large: 22-25 stems $100

Description: The Tropical Vibes bouquet is full of exotic blooms and tropical foliage that will transport your recipient to paradise. Featuring a mix of tropical flowers, such as proteas, orchids and birds of paradise, this bouquet is perfect for adding a unique twist to any traditional flower arrangement. Whether you’re gifting for a special occasion or simply to show your appreciation for someone special, the Tropical Vibes bouquet is absolutely perfect and will make an unforgettable statement. Ingredients vary based on quality and seasonality and each bouquet is one-of-a-kind. Available in 3 Sizes: Small: 12 -14 stems $65 Medium: 15-17 stems $95 Large: 20-22 stems $145

title: Casket Spray
Description: At Olfco, we make it easy to honor lost loved ones in the most thoughtful of ways. We specialize in custom casket sprays created with beautiful blooms and vibrant greenery that bring a sense of peace and love during difficult times. No matter what kind of tribute you’re looking for—traditional or modern, colorful or subtle—we can help you create the perfect look to best represent your honoree. We understand that this is a meaningful and significant event, which is why we take every step possible to ensure your expectations are met before delivery. By ordering from us, you can present a loving arrangement without having to worry about the details. Let us handle everything for you - from design to delivery- so that you can focus on sending special memories and salutations from your heart.

title: Corsage
Description: A modern corsage on adjustable metal bracelet cuff. Made with the same flowers and colour pallet selected for your event.

title: Table Garland Greenery
Description: Bunches of loose greenery for a cost effective and beautiful way to create the garland look. Place on guest tables, the head tables or tape together to hang for an archway or backdrop decor. Available in Italian Ruscus, Eucalyptus, Mixed Greens. General rule: 1 bunch lightly fills the length of an 8 ft table. Order 2-3 more bunches for a thicker garland look. Price is per bunch.

title: Memorial Wreaths
Description: A beautiful way to for a way to honor and memorialize your loved one, our customizable wreaths will give you the opportunity to create something truly special and unique for any service. Our Memorial Wreaths are crafted on a foam ring and decorated with lush greenery and timeless blooms. Each wreath is specially designed with a stand for easy upright display. Let us help honor your dear one; order your beautiful Memorial Wreath today!

title: Flower Girl
Description: Make your wedding day even more special with Flower Girl Flowers! Choose from a gorgeous mini bouquet or flower petals that can be lightly tossed down the aisle – whatever your flower girl decides is right for them.No matter what you choose, both the bouquet and petals are completely customizable so they can match your wedding décor perfectly. And best of all, they will look just as cute as your precious flower girl! Photo Credit: Sara Rogers Photography

title: Flower Crown
Description: Each flower crown is made on a wired jute ring and is adjustable to fit most head sized. Child crowns will be finished with a ribbon tie. Crowns will be made to compliment the event, with greenery and light floral.

title: Centerpieces
Description: Floral arrangements with simple glass vase included. Centerpiece arrangement: Perfect size for round guest tables, bar arrangement, can be used as pedestal arrangements.

title: Loose Stems
Description: Loose assorted blooms based on your colour pallet and complimentary to your wedding. Flowers are cleaned, hydrated and ready to go for any of your DIY decor needs. Approximately 50 stems per order. Cake Flowers - Enough to comfortably decorate the top of a cake, or a couple touches to 3 tiers.

title: Bridesmaid Bouquet
Description: A smaller version of your bridal to complement and keep your wedding beautifully cohesive. Same textured loveliness for your bridesmaids. Finished with long flowing ribbon. Photo Credit:olfco, olfco Nomadbynk

title: Bridal Bouquet
Description: An OLFCO bridal, full of lush greenery and flowers in the colour pallet of your choice. Full of texture and movement, the OLFCO bouquet is organic in shape and made with love and care. Each bouquet is different, but consistent in feel. Let us know the colour pallet you are looking for and we will design you a gorgeous bridal bouquet made with the best of what the current season has to offer. Tied with long white silk ribbon. Each bouquet comes with a vase, so you can keep your bouquet fresh from morning to reception. Photo Credits: Kaoverri Silva Photography, Shari + Mike

title: Boutonniere
Description: A tasteful boutonniere; not too big, not too small, just right. Made with the same flowers that you will find throughout the rest of your wedding. Tied with white silk ribbon. Photo Credit: Christine Pienaar Photography

title: Archway Flowers
Description: Floral Archway Piece, built on floral foam with backing for easy installation.

title: Nose Finger Puppets Bulk Box
Description: A Nose Finger Puppet for picky people. This 2-1/2" tall, soft vinyl nose not only comes in two colors, but it also has two holes you can choose to put a finger in and dig around. You’ll get 36 Nose Finger Puppets in a display box. You can also buy single Nose Finger Puppets here.

title: Itty Bitty Cactus - Bag of 8
Description: While the real thing is famous for needing very little water, these Itty Bitty Cactus need no water at all! After seeing the detail in these tiny cactuses, you’ll have to agree we’ve got an eye for cacti. Despite being between 1-5/16" and 1-1/2" tall, these soft vinyl cactus with colorful flowers have tons of detail. You can even see the stones in their planter. You get four different styles of cacti in an assorted bag of eight. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Pacific Northwest Salmon Candy Canes
Description: It’s obvious that Archie McPhee is based in Washington state when we think it’s a good idea to make candy canes that taste like salmon. Getting people to try these Salmon Candy Canes is like swimming upstream—difficult, but totally worth it. A set of six candy canes, 5-1/4" tall with pink and white stripes that taste like they would be at home in a fancy restaurant or on a fresh bagel with a schmear.

title: Chicken Feet Finger Puppets Bulk Box
Description: This display box is full of 2-1/4" tall, soft vinyl finger puppets that are a great replica of actual chicken feet. Your hand, and the hands of all your friends, will be laying eggs and scratching for worms in no time. (Product does not actually give your hand the ability to lay eggs.) 48 chicken feet in a beautifully illustrated display box.You can also buy a set of 2 Chicken Feet here.

title: Golden Girls Mug
Description: You should buy four of these so that when you sit with your three besties, you can all drink from them. Each ceramic Golden Girls Mug holds 14 ounces of liquid, which could be anything from tea to tequila. Officially licensed merch from a show that never gets old.

title: Vulture Ornament
Description: The Vulture Ornament is ready to help you celebrate the holidays! This vulture’s only wish for Christmas is a festive carcass under the tree. If that can’t happen, it’s happy to feast on leftover turkey or some ham gristle. This hand-blown glass, 3-1/2" tall Vulture Ornament is ready to inject a bit of dark reality into the hope and peace of your Christmas. Imagine if vultures saved Christmas by helping Santa with his sleigh! Includes string for hanging or can stand on its own. Illustrated acetate tube.

title: Itty Bitty Tools - Bag of 8
Description: When all you have is a tiny hammer, every problem looks like a tiny nail! This set of tiny tools with a toolbox just big enough to hold them provides enough soft vinyl tools to tackle all your small-scale problems. At between 7/8" and 1-1/4" long, the tools fit in the included 1-5/8" (4.1 cm) long toolbox. The perfect present for a compact carpenter. You get seven tools and one toolbox. Illustrated bag of eight Itty Bitty Tools. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Itty Bitty Trash - Bag of 10
Description: Scattering some Itty Bitty Trash makes it looks like fairies have been littering. That miniature world in your imagination is far too tidy! We’ve solved that problem with Itty Bitty Trash. You get 10 pieces of trash. Everything from a banana peel to a crushed water bottle made from soft vinyl. The sizes of the six different kinds of trash vary between 1/2" and 1-1/4" long. It’s like rooting through a gnome's garbage can! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Squawking Pigeon
Description: Why a Squawking Pigeon? We strive for true novelty innovation, but sometimes a slight variation is enough to make a new classic. This takes the idea of the Squawking Rubber Chicken and turns it into a squab squawker of hilarious proportion. This 10" long, soft vinyl Squawking Pigeon looks like it’s taking a break from perching on statues to squawk whenever you squeeze it. It's a major coo for us to have this exclusive advancement in bird hilarity technology.

title: Collection of Mini Mushrooms
Description: This Collection of Mini Mushrooms is a set of eight soft vinyl magical mushrooms each with its own stand. You can leave them in the cabinet of curiosities style package or take them out and make your own fairy circle. Adds a drop of goblincore to any flat surface. You’ll want to put them in your burlap treasure sack and take them to your goblin lair with your other precious shinies and pretties. They are all based on real mushrooms, brightly colored and vary in size from 1-3/8" to 1-3/4" tall. Comes in a deluxe illustrated box with clear cover that tells you the scientific name of each mushroom. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Fantastic Finger Monsters Bulk Box
Description: So many Fantastic Finger Monsters! This set of 48 Fantastic Finger Monsters comes in a display box depicting Planet Finger. These new, superior monsters have tails, scales and nails to impale. Between 1-3/4" and 2-1/4" tall, there are six different styles of soft vinyl monsters. Each style has two different color schemes for a total of 12 monsters. 48 count. In a beautiful display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy sets of 6 Fantastic Finger Monsters here.

title: Finger Shrimp Bulk Box
Description: An illustrated display box of 36 Shrimp Finger Puppets. Each soft vinyl shrimp is 4-1/4" long, transparent and comes in two colors. It’s just like that dream where you lived under the sea and spent all your time skittering on the ocean floor. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Finger Shrimp here.

title: Wind-Up Perky Pigeon
Description: Keeping pigeons is a great hobby, but it’s expensive and messy. This 3-5/8" tall, hard vinyl wind-up pigeon is a fantastic replacement. When you wind it up, it skitters around like the real thing. Just scatter some seeds on the ground, wind it up and coo under your breath. You’ll feel like a professional pigeon fancier. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Finger Owls - Set of 4 Owl Finger Puppets
Description: This set of four owl finger puppets captures a parliament of owls in a full swoop. It’s not a shock that a lot of Archie McPhee customers identify with owls since they are both solitary and nocturnal. These 1-5/8" tall, soft vinyl Finger Owls have their wings spread wide and their predator eyes fixed on their prey. Since owls and crows are natural enemies, if you want a bunch of drama, we recommend buying a set of Owl Finger Puppets and some Crow Finger Puppets and just seeing what happens. It's like the Real Housewives, but with barn owls. Who needs an owl puppet? You do. Comes in four owl-mazing colors. You can also buy Finger Owls in bulk here WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Capybara in a Peanut
Description: After getting TikTok famous and having a capybara theme song, this Capybara in a Peanut spent his influencer money on a luxury car. Capybaras don’t need to be anywhere in a hurry, so the measured pace of the peanut vehicle is perfect. This pull-back peanut driven by a capybara balancing an orange on its head is 5" long, has four wheels and is made of soft vinyl and plastic. You can pretend this capybara is driving to your house to provide emotional solace and moral support. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Surprise Popping Bigfoot
Description: Every Bigfoot hunter will want a Surprise Popping Bigfoot! It’s a universally understood Bigfoot fact that no matter how hard you try, you can never plan to see Bigfoot, it’s always a surprise. So, it’s natural that when you squeeze this 2-1/8" tall, unassuming ring of trees, a Bigfoot pops up! Made of soft rubber (TPR), this toy is both relaxing and shocking. The search for Bigfoot is over! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Space Needle Building Blocks
Description: We love the retro futuristic style of the Space Needle. It points to the Seattle sky as a permanent symbol of the optimism brought by the 1962 World’s Fair. This Seattle Space Needle mini building block set has 821 tiny pieces and is 9-7/8" tall when complete. Of course, it's so small that the observation deck is not going to attract any tourists, but it will serve as a reminder of a time when the future looked bright. They recommend you glue it together to make it permanent, but surely you’d rather assemble it ten to twenty times at different points in your life. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Bigfoot Basecamp
Description: Some say Bigfoot is an interdimensional traveler who disappears when he wants to, but maybe there are no good pictures of Bigfoot because he’s so tiny. The Bigfoot Basecamp has all the things you need to create the scene of a surprised camper trying to snap a picture as Bigfoot approaches. You can take the itty bitty soft vinyl figures, between 1/2" and 1-3/8" tall, out of the box and play with them or leave them inside as a desktop display. Comes with eight pieces, everything you need from trees to Bigfoot to a campfire! Figures may come loose during transit but snap easily back into place. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Jingle Butts Ornaments
Description: A little behind in your Christmas decorations? Jingle Butts to the rescue! These 3" tall, hand-blown glass ornaments look just like regular ornaments from the front, but the backside of the ornament is a backside! Not only that, but each Jingle Butt has its own tiny bell attached to it, as well as a string you can use to hang it from the tree. Ring in the Christmas cheer with a Christmas rear. Each package includes two ornaments, one red and one green. So shiny they’ll even sparkle in a full moon!

title: Itty Bitty White Picket Fence
Description: The Itty Bitty White Picket Fence is here to redefine suburbia. The white picket fence is how good suburban neighbors set boundaries. Each section of Itty Bitty White Picket Fence is 1/2" tall and is made of soft vinyl. Link them together and you can build a fence around the candy on your desk, your car keys or your phone. Buy multiple bags for bigger fences! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Manatea Tea Infuser
Description: Few things are as relaxing as watching a manatee float in water. Just fill this manatee with some loose leaf tea, hang it on the side of your cup and wait for it to steep while it soaks. You end up happy and so does the manatee. Made of food-safe silicone.

title: Itty Bitty Black Cats - Bag of 12
Description: We have a special place in our hearts for black cats. They’re unfairly considered unlucky, but just think how lucky you’d be to get this illustrated bag of 12 soft vinyl, dark kitties between 3/8" and 1" tall. You get two each of six different styles. The cuteness is truly overwhelming. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Opera Corn
Description: Opera Corn is the starch that can sing. In fact, it creams the competition! When it comes to an a-maize-ing aria, we’re all ears! This electronic Opera Corn sings when you press the button! Figaro! Figaro! It’s a hard vinyl ear of corn that is 6-1/4" tall that produces one of five ear-resistable operatic sounds at the push of a button. It’s a regular Luciano Cobarotti. You wouldn’t expect such highbrow music from corn, but we went against the grain. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Collection of Mini Garden Birds
Description: Spotting a beautiful bird in your backyard is like watching a fashion show. This Collection of Mini Garden Birds is a set of eight different soft vinyl birds that you can arrange to your heart's desire. The package is designed to look like a birdhouse, so you could just leave the figures in the package or take them out and make displays in your house. Hide them for your partner so you can take turns bird-spotting! Each 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" tall figure is based on a real bird. Includes Steller’s Jay, Goldfinch, Oriole, Blue Jay, Cardinal, Blue Tit and more! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Super Awesome Gift Card
Description: Can't decide between an Inflatable Unicorn Horn for Cats and Finger Hands? Not sure whether your mom already has Plague Doctor Socks? Send them an Archie McPhee Super Awesome Gift Card! That's right, you fill out the form, choose the amount and instantly you will be sent an email. The email will contain your gift message and a redemption code that can be used to buy super awesome things from us! Great for last minute gifts or as a thoughtful "thinking of you" any time of year. Better than flowers, not as good as gold bullion. Remember, this is a virtual gift certificate delivered by email, you will not receive anything by snail mail. Then forward to a friend for a Super Awesome Gift!

title: Tuxedo Cat Coin Purse
Description: It’s a coin purse shaped like a little tuxedo cat. This soft vinyl, 5-1/4" long purse has a paw zipper pull and is the perfect size for cords, earbuds or actual coins! So cute! This is more properly called a coin purr-se! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Missing You Bigfoot Greeting Card
Description: Bigfoot is happy to be alone most of the time, but every once in a while, he feels a pang in his heart. He misses you! This blank card isn't for everyone, but we bet you know a fellow hermit who will understand it. It's a 5" x 7" card, with envelope, that expresses your honest desire for someone to know that you’d like to be with them.

title: Pizza Mask
Description: Pizza face used to be an insult, but not anymore! Just about everyone likes pizza! Even airport pizza makes people smile. So, just imagine the reaction you’ll get when you show up to a job interview wearing this 9-1/2" tall EVA foam Pizza Mask. Just shout, “Did somebody order pizza?” Who wouldn’t want pizza as a coworker? So realistic you’ll think you need to carry around a napkin to dab up your own grease. Mask is held in place by an elastic band. Fits most adult heads.

title: Fried Chicken Candy in Tin
Description: If it were economically feasible, we’d sell Fried Chicken Candy in a cardboard bucket. Instead, it’s a 3-1/4" x 2-1/2" x 2" tin filled with 2-½ oz. of individually wrapped chicken-flavored candy. What the cluck? Add some savory to your candy jar! These brown and yellow striped hard candies taste like fried chicken. You can decide if that’s a good thing or a bad thing. This time when someone says, “It tastes like chicken,” they’ll really mean it!

title: Itty Bitty Body Parts - Bag of 14
Description: Itty Bitty Body Parts are infinitesimal internal organs! Are you a micro mad scientist or a minuscule mortician? These 14 tiny organs, between 3/4" and 1-1/4" long, are made of soft vinyl and are perfect for teaching anatomy or grossing out friends with magnifying glasses. Includes two each of heart, brain, kidneys, lungs and more! They come in three different semi-realistic colors. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Racing Cats in Sacks Bulk Box
Description: These cats are propelling themselves across the room in sacks! This display box of twenty-four 3-1/4" (8.2 cm) long, soft vinyl and plastic racers comes in an assortment of four different colors, each featuring the back half of a different kitty having the time of its life and a different business logo. Illustrated display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy a set of 4 Racing Cats in Sacks here.

title: Cleaning Kitties Bulk Box
Description: This display box of 24 soft vinyl Cleaning Kitties figures celebrates tongue-based cat personal hygiene with three different poses. They vary between 1-1/4" and 2-1/4" tall. The perfect present for cat owners with no judgment. 24 count assortment in a hilariously illustrated display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Cleaning Kitties here.

title: Wine Wiener Wine Stopper
Description: This Wine Wiener Wine Stopper asks you to shove a hot dog into your wine bottle. This hot dog will not make your wine taste like nitrates, but it will create a whimsical seal. Keep your wine hot dog fresh! Made of food-grade silicone. Hand wash only.

title: Grumpy Frog Ornament
Description: Nothing exemplifies Christmas in the 2020s quite like a grumpy frog. This frog is all of us. He’s shown up, he’s celebrating Christmas, but he still has a slight grumpy grimace. Just look at his cheery hat. He’s putting forth the effort! This is a 4-3/4" long, hand-blown glass ornament with a string for hanging on a tree or it can just sit on a table and stare at you while you watch Hallmark movies and drink eggnog.

title: Itty Bitty Possums - Bag of 8
Description: You can never have enough possums! That’s what you’ll be saying after you see these Itty Bitty Possums. At between 1" and 1-3/8" long in four different poses, you’ll keep buying more to increase your possum army! We’re trying to figure out if possum playing dead is our favorite or if it’s the one posed to hang from its tail. (If you can find something small enough to hang him from). WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Itty Bitty Traffic Cones - Bag of 10
Description: Traffic cones are your friend. Those little pointy fellows not only stack neatly, but they also protect you from potholes and parking in the wrong spot. You get 10 of them and each 1" tall Itty Bitty Traffic Cone is made of soft vinyl. You can mark off spills on your desk or protect the last piece of candy from being snatched by that guy who always takes it. You know who you are, Phil. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Itty Bitty Gargoyles
Description: You need the right tool for the job, and these Itty Bitty Gargoyles are exactly what you need to repel miniature malevolence. Gargoyles are the protectors of buildings and personal space. The only problem is they’re too huge to protect your apartment or desk at work. This set of four different 1-1/8" tall, hard vinyl gargoyles is prepared to keep evil at bay as they perch on the corners of your computer monitor. The perfect housewarming gift for someone moving into a very tiny cathedral. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Mr. Rat’s Joyride
Description: Mr. Rat’s Joyride is a dream come true for humans and rats. We’ve all seen rats struggle with trying to carry a piece of pizza. This clever rat has solved the problem by turning a pizza slice into a mechanized magic carpet that he can drive through the sewers and subways. Just think how much better your own vehicle would be if you were surrounded by delicious melty cheese and the smell of Italian spices. The pizza car is 5-1/2" long and made of soft vinyl and plastic. Just pull it back and release it to send this ratty buddy on an adventure. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Meditating Cactus Bulk Box
Description: This is a bulk box of 24 Meditating Cactuses. These cacti are in a meditative pose, attempting to overcome their inner darkness and prickly exteriors with the beautiful pink or yellow flowers of their true selves. Each 3-5/8" tall cactus is made of soft vinyl. Comes in an illustrated display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy individual Meditating Cactuses here.

title: Racing Bread Loaf Cats Bulk Box
Description: This is a bulk box of 24 Racing Bread Loaf Cats. When you pull these loaf cats back, they shoot forward! Each quick kitty is 2" long and made of soft vinyl and plastic. You’ll get four different cat breeds, from simple orange tabby to sophisticated tuxedo! Comes in an illustrated display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy a set of 4 Racing Bread Loaf Cats here.

title: Racing Bread Loaf Cats - Set of 4
Description: These Racing Bread Loaf Cats capture kitties all tucked up in the familiar “loaf of bread” position, but don’t be fooled by their docile demeanor. When you pull them back, they shoot forward! Each quick kitty is 2" long and made of soft vinyl and plastic. You’ll get four different cat breeds, from simple orange tabby to sophisticated tuxedo! WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy Racing Bread Loaf Cats in bulk here.

title: Secret Cat Cult
Description: Have you heard about the Cat Cult? Your cats are moving around all night, and you think you know what they’re up to, but are you ready for the truth? This set of six soft vinyl 1-3/8" tall cats in robes, a 9/16" tall altar, and one 5/8" long bird sacrifice is a peek into the secret feline world of the Ancient Order of Cats. Worthy of a six-episode documentary on your favorite streaming service. Comes in a box that looks like you’re interrupting a ceremony in the basement. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Emergency Crow Sounds
Description: Crows have a rich and complex language that humans just can’t understand. You can use this noisemaker to possibly ingratiate yourself with your corvid cohorts. This plastic 3-1/2" electronic Emergency Crow noisemaker includes four sounds — caw, rattle, angry and murder. You’ll become a master of crow-munication! Three LR44 batteries included.

title: Happy Axolotls Bulk Box
Description: Anyone who knows what an axolotl is will want at least 24 of these! This is a display box full of 3" long, soft vinyl axolotls in four glorious color combinations. They’re even smiling! Comes in a colorful display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy a set of 4 Happy Axolotls here.

title: Bigfoot Nodder
Description: Bigfoot does not envy you having to drive everywhere. He’s out there feeling the earth on his big feet and taking it easy. So, instead of stewing about traffic during your commute, why not imagine you're searching for Bigfoot? Better yet, pretend he's your best friend already, he called shotgun on your dashboard, and now you're chauffeuring around this 6-3/8" tall, hard vinyl Sasquatch with a jiggly head attached with a spring.

title: Possum Candy
Description: This candy tastes like a possum! Some animals just look so good you wonder what they taste like and possums are definitely at the head of the pack. Garbage fed, gourmet taste! You get 2.5 oz of individually wrapped, pink and gray striped hard candy with the flavor of everyone’s favorite garbage-munching marsupial. Some describe the flavor as being like pork, but with notes of piquant swill.

title: Itty Bitty Hummingbirds - Bag of 12
Description: Unlike real hummingbirds, Itty Bitty Hummingbirds will hang out with you even if you don’t have any nectar. Hummingbirds are already adorably tiny, but imagine if these warp-speed-winged wonders were even tinier! Itty Bitty Hummingbirds are 1/2" tall and made of soft vinyl. They come in four different beautiful color combinations. You know you’ve always wanted a real hummingbird to sit on the tip of your pinky finger, this is the next best thing. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Squishy Armadillo
Description: This Squishy Armadillo gives you all the textures and awkward cuteness of an armadillo without the pointy bits or random tufts of hair. Our armadillo is 4-1/2" tall and made of soft rubber (TPR) filled with a viscous substance that you can squish, and it will go back to its regular shape. Trying to fidget with an actual armadillo is not a good idea, but this is a perfect fidgety friend. You probably never thought you’d cuddle with a creature that has an armored shell and claws, but here we are. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. WARNING: Never set me anywhere you wouldn’t let a real armadillo sit down because we both can stain. Avoid the following: All porous surfaces! Mom’s couch! The seats of Dad’s new car! Walls you’re fond of! Your sister’s new dress!

title: Itty Bitty Cats - Bag of 12
Description: Just because these soft vinyl Itty Bitty Cats are so small, between 3/8" and 1" tall, doesn’t mean we’ve sacrificed their personality and attitude. With six different poses, each in two color combinations, you get a total of 12 cats in an illustrated bag. These cats are so realistic your actual cats will want to knock them off a shelf. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS.

title: Racing Blobfish Bulk Box
Description: This display box of 24 Racing Blobfish is a bounty of brisk blobs! Pull back on these Racing Blobfish, and they'll zoom forward with a look of misery on their faces that belies the joy in their hearts. These 2-3/4" soft vinyl and plastic blobfish look bleak, but they're really beacons of euphoria (we think). You’ll get an assortment of four different colors in a beautiful display box. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD. SMALL PARTS. NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 3 YEARS. You can also buy a set of 4 Racing Blobfish here.

title: Leopard Printed Velvet Ginger Flats
Description: On-trend fabric meets on-trend print!We are loving the Leopard Printed Velvet Ginger Flats for their classic silhouette and elevated construction. Featuring delicate black piping, an adjustable arch strap, and a luxe velvet exterior, these are perfect for casual days where you want an elegant touch. Pair with denim, dresses, skirts, or sweaters!Our Favorite Details: Square toe Adjustable arch strap with buckle closure Black piping Leopard print Velvet exterior Material: 100% Cotton (upper), 100% Bovine Leather (outsole)Care: Store in box provided, spot clean with stain protectorAbout the BrandLoeffler Randall cherishes quality, craftsmanship, and originality. The female-founded brand consists of expertly designed shoes and accessories that have soul and a story to tell.

title: Black Dupioni Kendall Skirt
Description: A timeless black midi skirtThe Kendall Skirt blends vintage-charm with modern (and functional) details for a chic style staple that can be worn to countless occasions. The comfortable elastic waistband and flattering A-line silhouette make it perfect for pairing with sweaters, body suits, blouses, and more!Our Favorite Details: Elastic wide waistband Front pleating Side pockets Lined Material: 68% Rayon, 32% Polyester (outer), 97% Polyester, 3% Spandex (lining)Care: Dry clean

title: Vintage Trellis Petworth Dress
Description: A classic dress made for every momentThe Vintage Trellis Petworth Dress features painterly florals in rich shades of blue, rust, and forest green, finished with a ruffled high neck and softly structured silhouette. Perfect for autumn gatherings and winter soirées, pair it with heels and delicate jewelry for effortless elegance.Our Favorite Details: Ruffled high neck Concealed side zip closure Hand screen-printed Side seam pockets Lined Made in India Material: 100% Organic Cotton Care: Machine wash cold, lay flat to dryAbout the BrandPink City Prints designs beautiful hand-made pieces by artisans in India. Vibrant, unique, and sustainable, this collection will stand out in your wardrobe this season.

title: Mist Short Greta Showerproof Jacket
Description: A must have in your outerwear collection.Cut in a classic double-breasted trench shape from cotton blend twill with mock horn buttons, a wide buckled belt, fold down collar and wrist tabs, the unmistakable mark of the luxury lifestyle brand is evident throughout from its sleek country check lining to its embossed buttons and embroidered logo to the lower left pocket. Looking just as great with jeans as it does with more formal ensembles, this is an enduring essential that deserves to be shown off at every opportunity.Our Favorite Details: Point collar Long sleeves Adjustable straps at cuffs Double-breasted front Front button closure Faux horn trims Storm flap at button closure Removable belt (included) Belt loops Front welt pockets Back vent Water-resistant Country check lining Material: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton (outer), 100% Polyester (inner)Care: Dry cleanAbout the BrandSince 1894, J. Barbour® & Sons has remained a family-owned heritage of quality. With three Royal Warrants proudly featured in every coat, it's no surprise that in our quest for quality, we turn to Barbour® season after season.

title: Flint Country Estate Cereal/Ice Cream Bowl
Description: From the Country Estate Collection- these bowls serve as perfect vessels for the morning cereal or your proverbial cherries. Life is lovely when you have a bowlful. Featuring: Hen House, Tea Party Tent, Apple Orchard, and Rose Arbor.Material: Ceramic Care: Dishwasher (avoid high heat), Freezer, Microwave and Oven Safe (up to 500 degrees). Avoid cleaners that contain citrus. For pieces that contain a non-ceramic component, such as the Soap Pumps or Tiered Server, we recommend hand-wash only. Please review our Product Care section for more details on how to care for your Juliska products.About the BrandCapucine and David Gooding founded Juliska as newlyweds, with a small collection of blown glass. Today, the brand takes pride in being an architect of togetherness, making hundreds of products for the table and the home.

title: Medium Gold Allette Candleholder
Description: This medium-sized handcrafted ceramic candleholder is enhanced with a ribbing effect created by the potter's own hand. It has a pure, artisanal look and is versatile enough for daily use or to add some rustic character to a table setting as a single or a pair.Our Favorite Details: Sold individually Made in Italy Material: Porcelain, 10k goldCare: Clean with a dry clothAbout the BrandEmbracing the innate style and wanderlust of founder Aerin Lauder, AERIN is a luxury lifestyle brand with carefully curated collections of accessories and home decor.

title: Navy and Brown Blanket Stitch Harrow Cardigan
Description: A cozy cardigan with thoughtful details for easy layering every day.The Harrow Cardigan is sure to keep you cozy this season. Featuring a shawl collar, whip stitch detailing, functional patch pockets, and faux leather knotted belt, this layer needs minimal styling! Easy to toss over tees, turtlenecks, or dresses—it's the kind of layer you'll live in from crisp mornings to fireside evenings.Our Favorite Details: Whip stitch detailing Patch pockets Faux leather belt (included) Material: 55% Cotton, 25% Acrylic, 20% WoolCare: Hand wash, lay flat to dry

Description: Take the effort out of layering.The Ella Sweater Blouse combines two styles by taking a chic sweater vest and adding classic details such as a ruffle collar and crisp white puffed sleeves. An incredibly soft-to-the-touch style that you can wear all year long, we are pairing it with a mini skirt and ballet flats in the warmer months, and with denim and boots in the cooler seasons.Our Favorite Details: White ruffle collar (detachable) Sweater vest bodice White puffed sleeves with button cuffs Stretch knit fabric Ultra-soft knit Material: 100% Cotton (collar, sleeves), 30% Acrylic, 27% Nylon, 20% Polyester, 20% Wool, 3% Spandex (sweater vest)Care: Delicate wash inside out, hang to dry

title: Black Alessia Mini Dress
Description: An update to your staple wardrobe.The Black Alessia Dress is a classic silhouette with elevated details. Boasting three-quarter length sleeves with pintucked details for added volume, this mini shirt-dress is easy, elegant, and versatile. Pair with heels for a dinner party, or with boots for casual coffee meetings.Our Favorite Details: Spread collar Three-quarter length sleeves with gathered pintucks Covered front button placket Side pockets Removable self-tie belt (included) Relaxed fit Material: 70% Polyester, 25% Nylon, 5% SpandexCare: Hand wash cold, hang to dry

title: Beige Control Short
Description: The Classic Control Short keeps you smooth, not stuffed with light-to-moderate compression. Made with a breathable, raw-cut European fabric this shapewear short smooths from waist to thigh. Our Favorite Details: Raw-cut edges Light to moderate compression Material: 100% Cotton GussetCare: Machine wash cold, hang to dry

title: Chocolate Selena Bag
Description: Your new everyday essentialCompact yet versatile, the Selena Bag features a rich chocolate hue and a detachable strap for multiple styling options. Whether worn crossbody for day-to-day ease or carried by hand for a polished finish, it’s the perfect accessory to elevate any look.Our Favorite Details: Top handle Removable crossbody strap (included) Magnetic snap closure Interior pocket Lined Material: Vegan leatherAbout the BrandUrban Expressions does not compromise on ethics or style. The brand was founded in 2005 by two conscious entrepreneurs looking for a modern solution for thoughtfully designed animal-friendly handbags. All products are certified by vegan.org and PETA.

title: Black Cashmere Riley Cardigan
Description: Your favorite cardigan is back in a new timeless hue!An incredibly cozy throw-on-and-go piece, the Black Riley Cashmere Cardigan is a true style staple. Crafted from the softest yarn, this chic number boasts long sleeves, front placket with self covered buttons giving it an extra special touch you're sure to love. We recommend wearing it anywhere and everywhere: in the office, on your next coffee date, running errands around town, or lounging at home.Our Favorite Details: Round neckline Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs Button down front placket Self-covered buttons Slim fit Ribbed hem Material: 100% CashmereCare: Dry clean

title: Dark Stone Essential Patch Half Zip Knitted Jumper
Description: Crafted from 100% wool, this Barbour sweatshirt features leather elbow patches for a nod to country life. This garment is detailed with a button-up funnel neck and long sleeves, making it perfect for keeping warm and cosy.Our Favorite Details: Front quarter-zip closure Front partial button placket Rib-knit trim Material: 100% Wool (outer), 100% Polyester (trim), 100% Leather (contrast)Care: Hand wash cold

title: Olive Velvet Kam Loafers
Description: Classic loafers in a luxe velvetUpgrade your wardrobe with the sophisticated silhouette of the Kam loafers. Elevated with an elongated square toe and leather trim, these can be worn with everything from power suits to maxi dresses.Our Favorite Details: Square toe Leather trim Slip-on style Material: Velvet, Leather

title: Navy Striped Ella Sweater Blouse
Description: Take the effort out of layering. The Ella Sweater Blouse combines two styles by taking a chic sweater vest and adding classic details such as a ruffle collar and crisp white puffed sleeves. An incredibly soft-to-the-touch style that you can wear all year long, style it with a mini skirt and ballet flats in the warmer months, and with denim and boots in the cooler seasons. title: Indigo Dots French Heirloom Shirt
Description: A romantic button-down This seasonless blouse boasts feminine details such as ruffle trim, pintucking along the front, and speckled dot detailing throughout. Pair with denim and boots for an easy, yet elevated look.Our Favorite Details: Front covered button placket Ruffle trim along collar, placket, and cuffs Button cuffs Front pintucking Dot detailing throughout Care: Hand washAbout the BrandDedicated to her twin daughters, Emerson Fry's re-brand of the India Collection is an ode to timeless, artful, everyday dressing. Made with the same quality fabrics, hand-block prints, and easy shapes, each piece is meant for year-round, effortless wear.

title: Blackwatch Selena Blouse
Description: Your favorite top gets a chic update in a fabulous tartan print.Meet the Blackwatch Selena Blouse. Effortlessly chic, we love the romantic details of this fun and feminine number. Featuring a ruffle stand collar and quarter length front placket with covered buttons, this puff-sleeved piece pairs well with dark denim and booties for daytime and can be elevated with leather pants, heels, and a clutch for a night out or a party.Our Favorite Details: Ruffle stand collar Short puff sleeves with ruffle cuffs Quarter length front button loop closure Covered buttons Blackwatch print Relaxed fit Material: 100% PolyesterCare: Hand wash cold, hang to dry or dry clean

title: Rust Borders Lucia Dress
Description: A versatile dress for any occasion!Hand screen-printed in a rich, autumnal rust tone, the Lucia Dress is a timeless staple for cooler days. With a flattering square neckline, long sleeves, and a button-down front, she’s effortlessly elegant and easy to wear. Style with boots and your favorite coat or a cosy knit for the perfect seasonal look.Our Favorite Details: Hand screen-printed Fabric covered buttons Side seam pockets Invisible side zipper Lined Material: 100% CottonCare: Machine wash cold, hang to dryAbout the BrandPink City Prints designs beautiful hand-made pieces by artisans in India. Vibrant, unique, and sustainable, this collection will stand out in your wardrobe this season.

title: Black Cashmere Jane Pant
Description: Who said loungewear can't be sleek and chic? The Jane Pant is crafted from soft cashmere and is designed to have a relaxed fit with elasticated waistband, effortlessly combining comfort with contemporary style. These wide-leg bottoms are sure to be a well-loved addition to your wardrobe. Pair it with a matching Black Cashmere Jane Hoodie thats perfect for a morning coffee run, a leisurely stroll, or just chilling at home.Our Favorite Details: High rise Elasticated waist band with self ties Straight hem Wide leg silhouette Relaxed fit Lightweight fabric Material: 100% CashmereCare: Dry clean

title: Black Embellished Faven Dress
Description: A glamorously elegant satin midi This sophisticated style is beautifully crafted from a luxe black fabric and features a mock neckline, long blouson sleeves, and straight silhouette. Our favorite detail has to be the beautifully embellished cuffs. Perfect for your next RSVP, style with heels, a clutch, and your favorite accessories. Our Favorite Details: Mock neckline Long blouson sleeves Embellished cuffs Removable self-tie belt Straight silhouette Midi length Lined Material: 100% Polyester (outer), 97% Polyester, 3% Spandex (lining)Care: Dry clean only

title: Black Tweed Long Sleeve Jackie Dress
Description: Your favorite style, now with sleeves. Named after the great style icon, Jackie O, the Jackie Dress is designed to make you feel confident and chic. The beauty is in the details—from the textured tweed fabric to the luxe braided trim and vintage-inspired buttons. The shift silhouette feels tailored but wears effortlessly, making it a closet icon. For everything from coffee catch-ups to client meetings, everyone needs a Jackie in her life.Our Favorite Details: Bracelet length sleeves Braided detailing along the neckline and faux pockets Faux front pockets with gold crest buttons Hidden back zip closure Lined Textured tweed fabric Material: 100% Polyester (outer), 97% Polyester, 3% Spandex (lining)Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

title: Winetasting High Rise Compression Spandex Millie Yoga Pant
Description: Every closet needs a classic yoga pantThe Millie Yoga Pants feature a flattering compression fit, high rise waistband, and full-length leg with a slightly flared bottom. title: Timeless Monogram Custom Stamp
Description: "Please ensure all information is submitted correctly as you would like it to print. Once production has begun on your custom order, changes can not be made.Our self-inking stamps are an easy way to add your return address to envelopes. Just press down on the stamp machine and it creates a clean, crisp impression of your custom text. From our friends at Three Designing Women.If you do not yet have a machine, select stamp set to receive your custom plate along with a machine with accompanying black water based ink pad. Select stamp plate only if you already own a machine and wish to receive just the plate of the design pictured. Stamp plates do not stamp without use of a machine.Ink: Stamp machine comes with a black water-based ink pad that lasts for 800-1000 impressions! We recommend changing your ink cartridge when adding a new plate so that you will get the best impression from your new design. For best results, always test your stamp impression on scrap paper before using on your project.Size: Stamp impressions are approximately 1 ½ x 1 ½. Stamp pad is 2 x 2. Stamp machine is 2 ⅛ W x 2 ¼ D x 4 ½ HProduction Time: 2-3 business days (plus shipping)Shipping: Stamp orders are shipped within 2-3 business days after your order is placed. Shipping time is dependent upon your selected method of shipment at checkout. Custom stamps will ship separately if ordered with other products. Sorry, stamps are not eligible for a gift box, and cannot be shipped internationally."

Crafted from durable Baltic birch bent plywood, their smooth curves and clean lines make them as comfortable as they are darling.
