Dimensions: 13" x 13" x 22" Weight: 10.2 lbs Materials: Bent plywood. All finishes are non-toxic, water-based and free of VOC health hazards. Assembly Instructions **Please note, this item is final sale. No returns will be accepted.

title: Western Party Set
Description: Yeehaw, it's time for a Western party! This theme evokes an adventurous vibe, with lots of opportunity for rustic charm, hearty food and dancing. A fun theme to celebrate a birthday party for all ages, a country music event or a BBQ. Make your party room look extra special with this party set for 8 people. It includes Western boot-shaped paper plates and party bags, cups, mini paper cowboy hats, bandana-shaped napkins and a statement flag garland. Pack the garland away after the party to reuse time and time again, or hang in your home to keep a happy hoedown feeling going all year.

title: Space Cupcake Kit (x 24 toppers)
Description: Create out-of-this-world space party cupcakes with this cupcake kit. It includes shiny silver foiled cupcake cases, and the toppers have a range of embellishments that look and feel amazing.

title: Felt Holly Headband
Description: This headband is topped with soft green felt leaves and bright red pompom berries, perfect to wear to Christmas parties or for imaginative dress up. The headband is wrapped with green gingham ribbon for a stylish effect. The ideal hair accessory to instantly make you look and feel festive.

title: Fall Stripe Guest Towels (x 16)
Description: Striped paper napkins are a bold, yet elegant choice for your Thanksgiving dinner or fall parties. We've also added a chic wavy border for a stylish upgrade. The rich colors add warmth and charm to make your table look extra special. The shape is ideal for table layering, and they're also perfect to place in guest bathrooms.

title: Ribbon Bow Guest Towels (x 16)
Description: Pink and red ribbon bows are the perfect design for an effortlessly chic Christmas look. The rich warm red brings classic festive charm, the soft pink and gold foil accents give a contemporary twist, and the bow design adds fashionable flair. These paper Christmas guest towels, with wonderful wavy edges, are ideal to place in your guest bathroom. You can also use them to style your party table.

title: Surprise Mushrooms (x 3)
Description: Is it a decoration or a party favor? Surprise, it's both! These on-trend mushroom designed gifts will look amazing on your party table and delight your guests. Simply unwrap to reveal a mushroom-shaped eraser, gold foil party hat, a trivia, 2 stickers and a friendship bracelet. They're great to pop into party bags too - ideal for a fairy party, woodland themed party or any special Fall celebration.

title: It's Halloween! Napkins (x 16)
Description: It's Halloween and time to celebrate! Our Halloween vintage-look napkins, featuring a happy black cat, pumpkin and skull-shaped designs, will definitely thrill your party guests. These boo-tiful napkins will also make your party table look terrific. They're great for all ages, and are ideal for a cocktail party too.

title: Plaid Small Napkins (x 16)
Description: Reminiscent of traditional holiday gatherings and cozy winter lodges, plaid is a timeless design choice for your Christmas celebrations. The mix of festive red, green and white, teamed with stripes of blue and shiny gold, give a modern makeover to this classic print. Our plaid small paper napkins are are perfect for creating a warm, nostalgic feel at your party table.

title: Swan Paper Placemats (x 12)
Description: Elegant and sophisticated, swan designs are back in style, fuelled by a renewed love for nostalgic classics. These special paper placemats are perfect for bridal showers, baby showers, princess parties, chic dinner parties or festive celebrations. The shiny gold foil details add just the right touch of sparkle.

title: Peach Daisy Baby Booties
Description: These adorable peach daisy baby booties will look utterly charming on little feet! They are perfect as a baby shower gift or for a newborn. They are beautifully crafted from organic knitted cotton, with a peach inner, cream petals and green leaf detail.

title: Gold Bow Cups (x 8)
Description: Add flair to your party with these elegant paper cups. The gold bow design is guaranteed to bring effortless sophistication to your table, making every setting shine. Disposable cups have never been this chic and are perfect for the whole family to use. Ideal for Christmas, New Year, golden wedding anniversaries, bridal showers and special birthdays.

title: Small Soft Lilac Paper Napkins (x 20)
Description: These beautiful blue napkins, with a pretty scallop edge, will look perfect on the table. They also team well with the matching Simply Eco plates.

title: Stripe Paper Honeycomb Trees (x 3)
Description: Just when you thought decorative Christmas trees couldn't get any more magical, our clever designers have given them a bold, modern makeover. The vibrant stripes and gold foil stairs make a festive statement in your home. Perfect for the table or mantel, they also offer a stylish, space-saving alternative to a traditional tree. Plus, they're reusable; simply fold them away and bring them out year after year for instant cheer.

title: Giant Honeycomb String Light Garland
Description: If ever there was a time to go big on your decorations, it's Christmas! This giant paper garland isn't just decor - it's the ultimate seasonal statement. Drape it along a staircase, let it cascade down a mantel, or hang in the porch, window or from trees, to transform any space into a winter wonderland. Featuring oversized 3D honeycomb paper fairy lights, in a bold mix of classic red and green with pops of teal and pink, for a show-stopping look. Reuse year after year to instantly bring back the cheer.

title: Magical Unicorn Napkins (x 16)
Description: Why have plain napkins when you can have unicorns? Create a magical environment for the perfect fairytale party with these wonderful party napkins. They are crafted in the shape of a beautiful unicorn, with shiny gold foil embellishments. They're perfect for a princess or unicorn birthday party.

title: Witch Hat Plates (x 8)
Description: The witching hour is here again, so delight your little coven with an elegantly eerie Halloween party. These witch hat napkins, adorned with chic striped bows, add a spellbinding touch to your table. Their classic black-and-white design pairs beautifully with the rest of your Halloween tableware and decorations

title: Halloween Large Napkins (x 16)
Description: The happy Halloween gang is here and ready to celebrate with you. These premium paper napkins will instantly give your Halloween party a hauntingly stylish look. The combination of a wavy black border, with traditional Halloween colors and pops of holographic silver, is perfect for a gathering that's equal parts eerie, elegant and fun.

title: Olive Grove Dotty Candle Holder - Pair
Description: A duo of olive hand-blown fluted candle holders with spotted details.

title: Rose Garden Dotty Candle Holder - Pair
Description: A duo of pink-hand blown fluted candle holders with spotted details.

title: Animal Parade Download & Print Bundle
Description: Bring instant joy to your party planning with this colorful Animal Parade download-and-print bundle. The editable set includes an invitation, thank you card, place card, garland, welcome sign, bottle label and party favor tags – all ready to personalize. A perfect last-minute solution for a beautifully co-ordinated celebration, filled with charm and wonder. Featuring illustrated animals in party hats, waving flags, holding balloons or bearing gifts – it's a party waiting to happen! Please note – How to personalize your bundle: *Once ordered, you will receive an order confirmation, and then following this, you will receive a separate email from Templett with a link to edit. You will need to click the link in the email and sign up for a Templett account to access the bundle. *Personalize your items, then save or approve the proofs. *Note: you can select the color, style and size of the font. *Once you are happy, save or approve the proofs. *Download your files and print or send digitally. Please note – How to personalize your invitation: *Once ordered, you will receive an order confirmation, and then following this, you will receive a separate email from Templett with a link to edit your invitation. You will need to click the link in the email and sign up for a Templett account to access the invitation. *Personalize your items, then save or approve the proofs. *Note: you can select the color, style and size of the font. *Once you are happy, save or approve the proofs. *Download your files and print or send digitally. title: Woodland Activity Baby Walker
Description: This traditional wooden activity walker is ready for adventure. This wonderful development toy makes an ideal gift for toddlers to explore the world around them, helping to build confidence during those first steps and beyond. A beautifully crafted toy, decorated in a stunning nature theme, decorated with sweet woodland and rainbow motifs in vibrant primary colours. With 12 play activities to discover, this toy is packed with a host of sensory features to help foster curiosity and encourage early learning through play. Beautifully crafted from highly durable sustainable rubber-wood and finished with non-toxic water based colours for child safe play.

title: Mixed Stripe Small Napkins (x 16)
Description: Stripes are a sensational way to add lots of color and style to any party table. These wonderful napkins feature 8 different stripes of color, and scalloped edges, for a decorative effect.

title: Meri Meri x Ladurée Paris Dinner Plates (x 8)
Description: We're delighted to collaborate with Laduree, the restaurant, tea room and macaron specialist, to create these beautiful paper plates. The gold foil design and scalloped borders are so stylish.

title: Cottage Garden Small Napkins (x 16)
Description: Welcome to our fantastic flower range! This pretty ditsy design is reminiscent of a cottage garden, with a field of floral wonder. Take your time to spot your favorites – daffodils, bluebells, daisies and many more – and instantly feel the joys of spring. These scalloped small napkins are the perfect tableware for a garden party, cocktail party, picnic, baby shower or bridal shower.

title: Le Mini Letter - Y
Description: Product Description Our Le Mini Letter Y is just one of our stunning decorative letter options. Each mini flower letter features real roses that last a year, arranged in a letter-shaped Parisian-inspired hat box. These mini flower arrangements make stunning, personalized gifts and home décor. For endless gifting opportunities, mix and match these mini letters with our mini flower numbers. Product Details Flower Count: 6 Petite Eternity® Roses Letter Dimensions: 2.75 x 2.375 x 2.25 (inches) Disclaimers:- Please note that variations will occur since all of our arrangements are uniquely handmade by our in-house designers.- Lay letters flat to prevent roses from bleeding onto surfaces. Product Care DO: Keep the arrangement in a room temperature environment. If dust collects after a few months remove it lightly using a duster. Keep the lid on the side of the bottom of the box. Be mindful when carrying the arrangement; it's a very delicate product. DON'T: Do not water the florals. Do not expose the florals to direct sunlight. Do not place anything into the florals as they can crush and damage the florals. Do not remove the florals from the box or vase, they are secure and happy there. Do not allow florals to have direct contact with light-colored fabric or surfaces, as staining may occur. When cared for properly, your luxury eternity arrangement can last up to a year with minimal effort, no watering, and no maintenance.

title: Floral Wine Glasses
Description: Product Description Sculpted by hand, each floral stemmed wine glass showcases a base that artfully resembles a blooming flower, gracefully connected to a winding stem that elegantly opens up to hold your delectable wine. The perfect addition to your collection of dining glasses or a thoughtful gift for a loved one. Available in red and white hues. Product Details Size: 3" W x 9.9" HMaterial: GlassDisclaimer: Please note that variations will occur since all of our pieces are uniquely handmade by our partner artisans. title: Mojave Petal Vase
Description: Product Description Our handcrafted Mojave Petal Arrangement is a testament to nature's artistry. Its form mirrors the delicate unfurling of petals, each contour meticulously sculpted at the vase's opening. Nestled within are our timeless eternity florals, paying homage to the enduring wildflowers that flourish in the Mojave desert. Product Care When properly cared for, eternity flowers will last a year or more with minimal effort. Keep the arrangement in a room-temperature environment. If dust collects with time, remove it lightly using a duster. Be mindful when carrying the arrangement; it's a very delicate product. Do not water the arrangement. Avoid exposure to direct sunlight. Don’t place objects on the flowers. Keep the flowers in the vase, they are secured there by expert florists and will ruin if removed. Avoid contact with light-colored fabric or surfaces as staining may occur.

title: Signature Scent Expansion Pack

Product Details Product Dimensions: 2” x 2” x 3”Product Weight: 1.7 Oz. Our Signature Scents Eternity® Rose Diffuser Oil:Eternity Rose captures the timeless elegance of freshly bloomed roses. Inspired by our iconic Eternity® Rose arrangements, this delicate yet enduring fragrance brings softness, warmth, and quiet beauty to any space. It’s a true expression of grace — familiar, romantic, and effortlessly refined. - Notes: Damascena rose, freesia, soft musk- Mood: Timeless, graceful, sereneRose Oud Diffuser Oil:Rose Oud is a luxurious interpretation of a classic rose — sensual, warm, and softly smoky. A radiant blend of light and depth, like moonlight dancing on the ocean.- Notes: Bergamot, sea salt, marigold, lily, sugar crystal, musk- Mood: Bright, modern, atmospheric

title: The Fleur Frame
Description: Product Description Introducing the Fleur Frame, a stunning picture frame adorned with eternity roses. The first of its kind, this picture frame is a true statement piece in the realm of home decor. This quality frame is designed to hold 5" x 7" photos, making it the perfect way to showcase your most cherished memories. With its secure clips, swapping out photos is effortless, making the Fleur Frame practical and elegant. The frame can either be displayed on the wall or sit flat on a surface, adding a touch of glamour to any room in your home. Ideal for any occasion, from Valentine's Day to birthdays and beyond, this frame is a must-have for anyone seeking a blend of luxury and functionality.*Our exclusive Fleur Frame design is proudly patent pending. Frequently Asked Questions What file sizes are accepted for the photo upload?We accept file sizes between 200KB and 7MB to ensure the highest quality for your fleur frame and the best experience.Which file types are supported for the photo upload?At this time, we only support JPEG/JPG file types to maintain image quality. What is the ideal resolution for the photo upload?For optimal results, we recommend a minimum of 1024 x 768 pixels. This will ensure your image looks sharp and vibrant within the frame.Can I edit my photo?Yes, after uploading your photo, you will have the option to make adjustments such as cropping, rotating, or fine tuning to create the perfect image for your luxurious fleur frame.What are the dimensions of the picture frame?The exquisite Fleur Frame, adorned with 18 stunning eternity roses, measures 12" x 10" in size. It gracefully accommodates a 5" x 7" photo within its elegant display area. Product Care DO: Keep the frame in a room-temperature environment. When cared for properly, your luxury eternity arrangement lasts a year or longer with minimal effort.

title: L'Atelier Vert Votive Set
Description: Product Description Inspired by the House’s foundation in nature’s sensory celebrations. title: Chérie Amour Candle
Description: Product Description The Chérie Amour candle honors the spark of first love. Sweet notes of pink grapefruit, lychee, and orange nectar swirl atop romantic botanical scents like rich rose, crispy verbena, Hawaiian ginger blossom, and soft patchouli, while deep, woodsy notes of cedar, tonka bean, and sandalwood add a reverent tone to fragrance—perfect for reflecting on those who fill our lives with affection. Each light of a match evokes a sweet fragrance that’s as captivating and irresistible as a new crush. Crafted from pink porcelain, this vessel features an embossed heart-bound logo, pierced by Cupid’s arrow, and a reflective gold metallic rim that catches and enhances the light of the flickering candle flame. Product Details More on our candle craftsmanship:Our candles are the result of meticulous attention to detail, made with the same commitment to excellence that we bring to our signature Eternity® florals. We developed the Chérie Amour candle with a storied European fragrance house that has been perfecting the art and science of scents for over 100 years. Each candle features a high-quality, non-toxic coconut-soy-paraffin blend that ensures a lasting, cleaner burn with minimal smoke and soot. This wax is infused with fragrant scent oils leveraging natural ingredients selected with the utmost care and hand-poured in California into our signature, hat box-inspired vessel.

Available in letters A-Z, Le Grand Letters are the perfect personal gift. Our floral letter D consists of real roses lasting at least a year and is fitting for all celebrations. For a more subtle gesture, select the Le Mini Letter D from the ever popular Letter Collection. Product Details Letter Dimensions: 13 x 11.5 x 6 (inches)Arrangement Weight: 1.5 lbs. Disclaimers:- Please note that variations will occur since all of our arrangements are uniquely handmade by our in-house designers. Product Care DO: Keep the arrangement in a room temperature environment. If dust collects after a few months remove it lightly using a duster. Keep the lid on the side of the bottom of the box. Be mindful when carrying the arrangement; it's a very delicate product. DON'T: Do not water the florals. Do not expose the florals to direct sunlight. Do not place anything into the florals as they can crush and damage the florals. Do not remove the florals from the box or vase, they are secure and happy there. Do not allow florals to have direct contact with light-colored fabric or surfaces, as staining may occur. When cared for properly, your luxury eternity arrangement can last up to a year with minimal effort, no watering, and no maintenance. THE LETTER COLLECTION With multiple ways to spell out how you feel, send your loved ones a personalized gift for any celebration. Whether you're looking for a birthday gift idea, personalized family gifts, unique romantic gifts, or one-of-a-kind graduation gifts these stunning floral letters are a perfect way to make someone's day. SHOP ALL LETTERS

CLASSIC COLLECTION Our Classic Collection is comprised of our beloved Eternity Roses set in square and Parisian hat box-inspired vases. The iconic arrangements embody everything that Venus ET Fleur stands for—sophistication, abundance, luxury, elegance, and beauty. SHOP ALL CLASSICS

This makes a perfect gift for your loved ones, creating a safe space and protection against any negative energy.
