title: Osmocote® Smart-Release® Plant Food Plus
Description: Osmocote® Smart-Release® Plant Food Plus is the ideal choice to provide your rose bushes with the balanced nutrition they need to thrive. Enriched with 11 essential nutrients, this plant food promotes strong growth, an abundance of blooms, and vibrant colour throughout the growing season. Its controlled-release formula feeds your roses for up to 6 months, making it an efficient and hassle-free way to care for your plants. Thanks to Osmocote®’s gradual nutrient release, your roses are nourished exactly when they need it, supporting their growth at every stage. And with the added peace of mind of a no-burn guarantee, you can apply this fertiliser confidently, knowing your roses will flourish without the risk of overfeeding. While perfect for roses, Osmocote® is also great for a wide range of other outdoor and indoor plants, including shrubs, perennials, and potted plants. It's a versatile, all-in-one solution for your garden. Key Benefits: Feeds roses for up to 6 months: One application nourishes your roses throughout the season, from early spring to late summer. Fortified with 11 essential nutrients: Helps promote strong, healthy growth and encourages an abundance of vibrant blooms. Controlled-release formula: Delivers nutrients gradually, ensuring your roses are fed when they need it most. Safe and reliable: No-burn guarantee when used as directed, ensuring your roses receive the perfect amount of feed. Suitable for all plants: Ideal for both indoor and outdoor plants, including shrubs, perennials, and potted plants. How to Use: When to Feed: Apply in early spring as new growth begins or when re-potting to provide a consistent feeding for up to 6 months. How to Apply: Sprinkle around the base of your roses and lightly work it into the soil. Water well to activate the nutrients. Serving Size: Follow the application guidelines based on the size and number of roses being fed. Packaging: Available in a resealable container for easy storage. With Osmocote® Smart-Release® Plant Food Plus, you can simplify your rose care routine while ensuring healthy, thriving plants that bloom year after year.

title: David Austin Winter Greeting Cards
Description: Spread a little festive cheer with our exquisite rose-themed winter cards. This set includes eight cards featuring two designs: Rosa Princess Anne (Auskitchen) in the frost, and a charming cluster of rose hips from Francis E. Lester, beautifully capturing the essence of winter in the garden.Our greetings cards are intentionally blank inside, providing you with space for your personal message. Each card comes with a kraft paper envelope, and both are kerbside recyclable.Our winter greetings cards are beautifully packaged in a David Austin cardboard sleeve box with a handy ribbon pull that can easily be repurposed to store seed packets, giving it a second life long after the winter season has passed. Printed in the UK using vegetable ink. Card dimensions: 6.6" x 4.7" Envelope dimensions: 6.9" x 4.9" Box dimensions: 8.5" x 5.2" x 1.1"

title: e-Gift Card
Description: If you’d like to give a rose as a gift but you’re not sure which rose to choose, why not give a David Austin e-Gift Card and let the recipient choose their own perfect rose? Perfect for that last-minute gift, our e-Gift Card will be sent instantly to your lucky recipient. Simply select an amount from $10 to $250 and then enter the recipient's email address below. e-Gift Card can be redeemed online or by phone.Gift Cards will expire 2 years after the last transaction on the card.Your gift message can be added before payment at checkout.

title: Bring Me Sunshine
Description: A joyously warm and inviting variety bearing deeply filled, cupped rosette blooms of rich sunset orange-yellow paling to lighter apricot tones over time. A healthy and upright, bushy shrub with a complex medium-strong Myrrh fragrance.

title: David Austin Roses Gift Card
Description: If you’d like to give a rose as a gift but you’re not sure which rose to choose, why not give a David Austin Gift Card and let the recipient choose their own perfect rose? Our new plastic-free gift cards feature our famous gold logo and come safely stored within a greetings card decorated with a gold illustration of English Roses and luxury envelope. There is space to add your own message or include a free gift message. Made from sustainable, FSC accredited card and using only vegetable inks, our new gift card pack is fully recyclable. Select an amount from $25 to $250. Gift cards can be redeemed online or by phone. If you wish to add a gift message, this can be done before payment at checkout.

title: Felco Secateur Holster 912
Description: The Felco 912 holster has a distinctive cone shape with a hole at bottom ensuring moisture and debris doesn’t collect inside. Perfect for keeping your secateurs conveniently close to hand, particularly when plenty of pruning is required. Made with heavy-duty leather, waxed thread and extra riveting this robust holster is easily attached to your belt or pocket and suitable to fit all Felco secateurs securely. The genuine leather will naturally mould to the shape of your secateurs, adding character with age. An excellent way to prevent losing your tools in the undergrowth. Colour: Tan leather Size: Length 15cm Heavy-duty genuine leather Integrated belt loop and pocket clip Fits all Felco secateurs Cone-shaped

title: David Austin Wedding Roses
Description: Inspired by his success in breeding roses for the garden, David and his eldest son, David J C Austin, have been working together since 1995 to create a new range of cut roses. These 14 flowers are specially tailored to withstand the rigors of weddings and special events while retaining the extraordinary beauty and fragrance that set David Austin Roses apart from any other. The book showcases some of the many magical moods that these exceptional cut roses are capable of creating with inspirational arrangements, atmospheres and wedding styles. It provides a host of bouquet ideas, color themes, decorative designs, and table centerpieces. If you are a bride-to-be, floral designer or simply love roses, this is a book for you as it illustrates how David Austin’s wedding and gift roses are truly a breed apart – roses that live up to the dream, whatever shape or form it happens to take.

title: Felco Secateurs Holster 910
Description: The Felco 910 holster is the perfect design for keeping your secateurs conveniently close to hand, particularly when plenty of pruning is required. Made with heavy-duty leather, waxed thread and extra riveting this robust holster is easily attached to your belt or pocket and suitable to fit all Felco secateurs securely. The genuine leather will naturally mould to the shape of your secateurs, adding character with age. An excellent way to prevent losing your tools in the undergrowth while caring for roses. Colour: Tan leather Size: Length 23.5cm Heavy-duty genuine leather Integrated belt loop and pocket clip Fits all Felco secateurs

title: Felco No. 6 Secateurs
Description: Perfect for pruning roses. A robust Swiss design, which is comfortable to use. No. 6 is suitable for a smaller hand.

title: Felco No.2 Secateurs
Description: The Felco No.2 original secateurs are perfect for pruning and dead-heading. The robust, forged aluminum alloy handles have a non-slip coating with classic red grips that are easy to spot. Cushioned shock absorbers help to protect hands and wrists with a smooth working action and soft closing. The strong steel blades are easily adjustable and superb at cutting through thick stems. All parts are replaceable. Colour: Red handles Size: For medium to large hands Lightweight and comfortable Steel blades with easy cutting adjustment Wire cutting notch and sap groove Bypass cutting action Lifetime guarantee

title: Carding Mill®
Description: The blooms are a beautiful blend of pink, apricot and yellow, giving the overall impression of orange. They have a lovely myrrh fragrance. It forms a bushy, rounded shrub with quite straight stems.

title: Vanessa Bell®
Description: Pink-tinged buds open to medium-sized cups held in large clusters. Pale yellow, paling to white at the edges; each has a rich yellow eye. The fragrance is similar to green tea with aspects of lemon and honey. It forms a bushy, upright shrub. Named for the artist, designer and founder member of the Bloomsbury Group – sister of the writer, Virginia Woolf.

title: The Poet's Wife
Description: Bears rich yellow flowers, which pale over time. Their formation is most pleasing, having a neat outer ring of petals enclosing an informal group of petals within. There is a strong, wonderfully rich fragrance with a hint of lemon, which becomes sweeter and stronger with age. It forms a bushy, nicely rounded shrub with arching branches and rather shiny foliage.

title: Lady of Shalott
Description: Rich orange-red buds open to chalice-shaped blooms, filled with loosely arranged, orange petals. The surrounding outer petals are salmon-pink with beautifully contrasting golden-yellow undersides. There is a pleasant, warm Tea fragrance, with hints of spiced apple and cloves. It quickly forms a bushy shrub with slightly arching stems and mid-green leaves, which have attractive, slightly bronzed tones when young. The name is taken from one of Alfred, Lord Tennyson’s poems to commemorate the 200th anniversary of his birth.

title: Desdemona
Description: Peachy pink buds open to beautiful, white, chalice-shaped blooms, with a pinkish hue. The incurved petals create an arresting interplay of light and shadow. The strong Old Rose fragrance has hints of almond blossom, cucumber and lemon zest. It forms a most attractive neat, rounded, bushy shrub. Named after the tragic heroine of Shakespeare’s Othello.

title: Lichfield Angel
Description: Pale peachy pink buds gradually open to form neatly cupped, cream rosettes. Each bloom has a perfect ring of waxy petals enclosing numerous smaller petals. Eventually the petals turn back to form a large, domed flower. It forms a vigorous, rounded, almost thornless shrub, its blooms nodding attractively on the branch. Named after an 8th century limestone sculptured panel, discovered in Lichfield Cathedral.

title: Golden Celebration®
Description: One of the largest-flowered English Roses, bearing rich yellow blooms in the form of giant cups. They have a strong Tea fragrance, developing wonderfully combined notes of Sauternes wine and strawberry. It forms a rounded shrub, with ample foliage – the flowers held beautifully poised on long, arching branches.

title: Darcey Bussell
Description: When young, the outer petals of each bloom form a perfect ring around an inner cup, gradually opening out to form a perfect, medium sized rosette. The color is a deep, rich crimson-pink, taking on a tinge of mauve just before the petals drop. There is a light-medium fruity scent. It forms a compact shrub with attractive bushy growth. Named after the highly acclaimed ballerina.

title: Tranquillity
Description: Beautifully rounded flowers, with neatly placed petals making up perfect rosettes. The buds are lightly tinged with yellow but as the flowers open they become pure white. A vigorous shrub; its growth is bushy and upright, clothed in light green foliage, curving outwards in a most attractive manner. With its pure white flowers, this rose lives up to its name.

title: Thomas à Becket®
Description: This is a variety of very different character from the general run of English Roses, being rather closer to the Species Roses than to the Old Roses and more natural and shrubby in growth. A striking crimson-red; the individual flowers can best be described as shallowly cupped, opening as informal rosettes; the petals quickly reflexing as the flowers age. They are held in medium-sized heads; the individual blooms nodding attractively on the stem. They have an Old Rose fragrance with a strong lemon zest character. It forms a strong, rather informal shrub. Named for Canterbury Cathedral.

title: The Lady Gardener®
Description: Bears large, quartered rosettes, each about 4” across, packed with loosely arranged petals. They are a beautiful shade of pure apricot, paling towards the edges. There is a lovely Tea fragrance, with hints of cedar wood and vanilla. Named for Plant Heritage, who do so much to protect Britain’s garden plant diversity.

title: Crown Princess Margareta®
Description: A vigorous climber, bearing quite large, many petalled, neat rosette flowers in a lovely shade of apricot-orange. They have a medium-strong Tea fragrance and are produced with exceptional freedom and regularity. There is plentiful, glossy foliage.

title: Appointment
Description: Test appointment for Cowlender.

title: SUPERGLUE
Description: Gel for extreme hold and shine Creates extreme styles never before possible with high hold, high shine and high definition. Benefits A long lasting moisturizer, prevents hair from damage, thickens hair and improves luster and shine. Provides strong, lasting hold. A natural lubricant provides body and shine. Usage Apply a generous amount to towel-dried hair, bring the look to life and let hair dry naturally. Benefits Softens and soothes the skin. Helps alleviate irritation during shaving. Ingredients Aqua/Water/Eau, VP/Dimethylaminoethylmethacrylate Copolymer, Acrylates Crosspolymer-3, Aminomethyl Propanol, Acrylates Copolymer, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Phenoxyethanol.

title: FIBER PRE-STYLING SHAMPOO
Description: American Crew's Fiber Shampoo strengthens and reconstructs the hair fiber from the inside by penetrating the cortex. This specially formulated shampoo acts as a pre-styling product for men seeking to restore shine to their limp locks without being weighed down. It enhances hair elasticity and improves texture while gently cleansing and balancing the scalp's microbiome, making hair more manageable and easier to style. Prepare your hair for the ultimate damage control with our transformative Fiber pre-styling shampoo. For best results, follow with the American Crew Fiber, Fiber Cream, or Fiber Grooming Foam.

title: BOOST PRE-STYLING SHAMPOO
Description: American Crew's Boost Shampoo is the ideal first step in your fine hair styling routine. After cleansing, this volumizing shampoo creates the appearance of fuller-looking hair and provides instant lift. This specially formulated shampoo acts as a pre-styling product for men seeking hydrated and nourished hair without being weighed down. It gently cleanses while balancing the scalp's microbiome, making hair more manageable and easier to style. Prepare thin hair for the ultimate volume with our transformative Boost pre-styling shampoo. For best results, follow with the American Crew Boost Powder.

title: FORMING PRE-STYLING SHAMPOO
Description: American Crew's Forming Cream Shampoo defines, hydrates, and enhances curls. This specially formulated shampoo acts as a pre-styling product for men seeking well-defined and nourished hair without being weighed down. This anti-frizz shampoo includes jojoba oil to add natural shine and tame unruly strands. It gently cleanses while balancing the scalp's microbiome, making hair more manageable and easier to style. Prepare your hair for the ultimate curl definition with our transformative Forming pre-styling shampoo. For best results, follow with the American Crew Forming Cream.

title: 3-IN-1 CHAMOMILE + PINE
Description: American Crew's Chamomile and Pine Shampoo is the ultimate 3-in-1 solution, combining shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in one convenient formula. Infused with a relaxing blend of chamomile and pine scent, this chamomile and pine shampoo gently cleanses, nourishes, and refreshes both your hair and body. Perfect for men on the go, it offers a deep clean while leaving you with a soothing fragrance that lasts throughout the day. Ideal for travel or the gym, this product provides a complete grooming solution with the calming benefits of chamomile and pine.

title: 3-IN-1 GINGER + TEA
Description: All-in-one shampoo, conditioner, and body wash formulated with energizing Ginger and Tea scent.

title: ANTI-DANDRUFF + DRY SCALP SHAMPOO FOR MEN
Description: The American Crew Anti-Dandruff + Dry Scalp Shampoo is a highly effective dandruff shampoo and relieves irritating itch while helping prevent dandruff and dry scalp. This formula leaves hair feeling refreshed, hydrated, and manageable. Formulated with a potent blend of active ingredients, this dandruff shampoo eliminates visible flakes while deeply moisturizing your scalp, helping you achieve healthy, clean, and flake-free hair.

title: Matte Clay Spray
Description: The American Crew Matte Clay Spray, formulated with Kaolin Clay, provides major texture and body to the hair, and has strong medium hold that lasts all day.

title: Whip
Description: An airy, weightless whipped formulation that provides subtle texture and control for a natural, effortless look. This unique styling whip readily absorbs into hair - providing definition and separation without adding weight or stickiness - to deliver a light, pliable hold and natural shine for healthy looking hair.

title: DAILY SILVER SHAMPOO
Description: American Crew Daily Silver Shampoo is a brightening shampoo for grey hair, designed to revitalize and brighten the hair. This shampoo for gray hair is specially formulated to enhance the natural radiance of gray and silver tones. The reduced pigment load in this shampoo for gray hair allows for daily use, keeping your hair looking naturally vibrant and refreshed.

title: Prep & Prime Tonic
Description: American Crew's tonic spray for hair, Prep Prime Tonic, is a lightly moisturizing and refreshing formula designed to prepare your hair for cutting and styling. This versatile tonic adds light hold and texture, increasing control and manageability for a polished look. Infused with heat protection, it shields your hair from styling tools, keeping it healthy and protected while enhancing your style. Perfect for achieving a controlled, textured finish, this tonic spray for hair is a must-have in your grooming routine.

title: DETOX SHAMPOO FOR MEN
Description: Give your hair and scalp the ultimate reset with American Crew Detox Shampoo. Formulated with powerful ingredients like coconut shells and Manicouagan clay, this deep-cleansing shampoo removes excess oil, dirt, and product buildup without stripping essential moisture. Perfect for men who demand a clean, healthy foundation for any style.

title: DAILY MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER
Description: Experience the benefits of American Crew’s men's daily moisturizing conditioner, designed for triple action: restoring, strengthening, and protecting your hair. This conditioner leaves hair feeling soft, manageable, and perfectly prepped for styling. Ideal for men with normal to dry hair, it’s vegan, silicone-free, and formulated to provide essential hydration and care. Keep your hair looking healthy and strong every day with this top-quality men's daily hair conditioner.

title: DAILY DEEP MOISTURIZING SHAMPOO FOR MEN
Description: Quench your hair’s thirst with American Crew Daily Deep Moisturizing Shampoo, expertly crafted for men with dry to normal hair. Infused with nourishing ingredients like vitamin B5, this hydrating formula cleanses gently while locking in essential moisture, leaving your hair feeling soft, healthy, and manageable every day. Our moisturizing shampoo is infused with our signature citrus mint fragrance and is silicone free and vegan.

title: DAILY CLEANSING SHAMPOO FOR MEN
Description: Refresh and invigorate your hair every day with American Crew Daily Cleansing Shampoo. Enriched with Vitamin B5, this silicone-free, vegan formula effectively removes excess oil without drying, leaving your hair soft, manageable, and healthy-looking. Infused with our energizing, Our daily shampoo delivers a deep clean without stripping your hair of its natural oils. Whether you're heading to work, the gym, or a night out, keep your hair looking healthy, hydrated, and effortlessly styled.

title: Moustache Wax
Description: American Crew Moustache Wax offers strong hold for men with medium to long moustaches. This long-lasting, high-hold mustache wax tames, nourishes, and controls facial hair for a polished look. The formula is easy to apply, just rub a small amount between fingers to warm, apply to moustache, and style as desired. Perfect for achieving a well-groomed appearance, this mustache wax provides definition and control while keeping your moustache in place throughout the day.

title: 2 in 1 Skin Moisturizer and Beard Conditioner
Description: American Crew's 2-in-1 Skin Moisturizer and men's beard conditioner is a lightweight, all-in-one product that keeps your beard soft and conditioned while moisturizing the skin underneath. This versatile formula is perfect for men with shorter beards, providing hydration and a smooth, manageable feel. Simply apply as needed to both the skin and beard for the best results.

title: GROOMING SPRAY
Description: Variable hold finishing spray Grooming Spray is an incredibly flexible product. Use it on damp hair before styling or when hair is dry to hold styles in place. Excellent for gray hair or fine hair prone to static. It's also a buildable product, meaning the more you apply, the greater the hold. Grooming Spray washes out easily with no sticky residue.

title: MOISTURIZING SHAVE CREAM
Description: American Crew's moisturizing shaving cream is suitable for all skin types, offering a smooth, close shave while preventing dryness. This non-drying formula helps alleviate irritation, providing a comfortable shave every time. Designed to hydrate and protect the skin, our moisturizing shaving cream ensures a soothing, irritation-free experience, leaving your skin feeling soft and refreshed after each use. Perfect for all men looking for a high-quality shaving solution.

title: LIQUID WAX
Description: Liquid wax, hair control, medium hold and shine Controls like a gel, finishes like a wax with medium hold & shine. Creates infinite styles.

title: ULTRA GLIDING SHAVE OIL
Description: American Crew Ultra Gliding Shave Oil prepares the skin for shaving and can be used as a prep under shave cream or gel. This shaving oil softens the beard and prepares the skin for a close and comfortable shave without leaving an oily residue. Formulated with a unique blend of botanical ingredients and essential oils, our shaving oil delivers a smooth glide for an effortless shaving experience. American Crew shaving oil is suitable for all beard types.

title: MATTE CLAY
Description: American Crew's Matte Clay is the ultimate clay hair product for achieving high hold with a medium shine. This concentrated styling formula gives you the power to shape and manipulate your hair into any style. Infused with natural extracts and beeswax, it provides a touchable texture while maintaining a strong, pliable hold. Ideal for short styles, Matte Clay is also perfect for those who prefer a subtle, natural fragrance. Whether you're active in sports or tend to perspire heavily, this clay hair product ensures your style stays intact throughout the day.

title: BEARD FOAM CLEANSER
Description: Leave-in beard cleanser. Easy to use and quick absorbing dry foam with long lasting, leaving the beard clean and free of daily residue.

title: BEARD BALM
Description: American Crew Beard Balm is a beard conditioner and styler. This beard balm tames and conditions the beard with flexible application for styling. Our versatile beard balm helps nourish and soften facial hair while providing light control to keep your beard looking well-groomed and manageable all day.

title: ALL-IN-ONE FACE BALM SPF 15
Description: American Crew's aftershave balm soothes freshly shaved skin, helping to prevent irritation and minimize redness. This product serves as a daily moisturizer and provides anti-aging benefits, making it an essential part of your skincare routine. Its all-in-one face cream formula combines multiple benefits into one convenient product, hydrating and protecting your skin while also preventing ingrown hairs. With innovative ingredients that fight the signs of aging, this all-in-one face cream offers a simple and effective solution for healthy, refreshed skin.

title: BEARD SERUM
Description: Our beard serum contains a lightweight, fast-absorbing oil based formula specially designed for beard care, with beneficial oils that instantly condition and keep the beard soft and well-groomed. This beard serum helps to nourish the beard and the skin underneath, promoting healthier growth while adding a natural shine. Perfect for achieving a polished look, our beard serum ensures your beard feels smooth, soft, and manageable throughout the day.

title: FIBER
Description: American Crew's texture fiber is a high-hold, low-shine styling product that helps thicken, texturize, and add fullness to your hair. This fiber-like, resinous formula provides a strong, pliable hold with a matte finish, perfect for creating a natural, textured look. Ideal for shorter hair, ranging from 1-3 inches in length, texture fiber gives you the control and definition you need for a perfectly styled, voluminous appearance. Perfect for achieving bold, structured hairstyles with long-lasting hold.

title: FIBER CREAM
Description: American Crew's Fiber Cream provides medium hold and a natural shine, making it an excellent choice for styling. This fibrous cream combines flexibility with control, giving your hair refined texture and a polished finish. Ideal for shaping and styling, it offers the perfect balance of hold and natural shine. Whether you're aiming for a sleek look or a more textured style, this American Crew styling cream delivers the results you need.

title: FIRM HOLD STYLING CREAM
Description: Non-flaking formula The ultimate in holding power, is enriched with natural extracts like Vitamin B5 to help hair look thicker with added shine. This alcohol-free gel is superior in hold and shine and has a low pH to prevent drying of the scalp

title: FIRM HOLD STYLING GEL
Description: American Crew’s strong hold hair gel, Firm Hold Styling Gel, delivers maximum holding power with a high-shine finish. Enriched with natural extracts like Vitamin B5, this gel helps your hair look thicker while providing added shine. Perfect for all-day hold, this alcohol-free formula offers superior control without drying out the scalp, thanks to its low pH. Achieve a polished, structured look with our strong hold hair gel, ideal for men seeking lasting style and volume.

title: FORMING CREAM
Description: Medium hold with medium shine Easy to use styling cream works well for all hair types. Forming Cream provides hold, excellent pliability, and a natural shine. This product also helps hair look thicker and is ideal for easing new users into the potential of styling jar products.

title: GROOMING CREAM
Description: American Crew's Grooming Cream offers high hold with a high shine, perfect for creating a sleek, straight look or softening naturally curly or wavy hair. Infused with conditioning ingredients like aloe vera, it helps maintain moisture balance while repelling excess moisture to keep your style intact. This versatile product is ideal for those looking for a grooming cream for long hair, providing excellent hold and shine for smooth, controlled styles that last all day.

title: HEAVY HOLD POMADE
Description: Heavy Hold Pomade is the best pomade for thick hair out of all of the American Crew hair pucks, offering a strong hold and high shine for creating sleek, smooth styles. This strong hold water-based pomade is perfect for sculpting and styling thick hair, providing lasting control and definition. Whether you're aiming for a polished, structured look or a smooth finish, this heavy hold pomade ensures your style stays in place all day. With its ability to provide high shine and strong hold, it’s an essential styling product for achieving bold, refined looks.

title: LIGHT HOLD STYLING GEL
Description: Non-flaking formula Light Hold Styling Gel builds thickness and shine while providing light control. Our alcohol-free, flake-free formula will not dry the scalp and contains thermal barriers that protect the hair from environmental stress and blow drying or heat treatments. This is one gel that works to condition scalp with ginseng and sage extract.

title: LIGHT HOLD TEXTURE LOTION
Description: Subtle control with low shine Provides light control for fine or thin hair of all lengths, resulting in a natural look with slight definition. Light Hold Texture Lotion is formulated with natural extracts like ginseng to make hair look thicker and increase manageability. This is an excellent choice for those who want light control in their hair without using a lot of styling product. Perfect for creating a healthy, natural, barely styled look with minimal effort.

title: MEDIUM HOLD SPRAY GEL
Description: Easy styling control Enriched with Sage, Ginseng, and Quillaja, Medium Hold Spray Gel provides a natural look and feel with medium hold. Excellent for blow drying and hair of all lengths, this product can be used on damp or dry hair.

title: POMADE
Description: Our pomade provides a medium hold with high shine. This product works well for curly hair and provides a modern, flexible alternative to styling gels. Use it to create classic, slicked-back looks or for control in any hair type. This water-based pomade offers easy application and a clean finish. Perfect for achieving sleek, polished styles without the heavy residue, our water-based pomade gives you a versatile, high-shine finish with a smooth, medium hold.

title: MOLDING CLAY
Description: American Crew's Molding Clay offers the perfect solution for styling hair with clay, providing high hold and a medium shine for a polished, structured look.This concentrated formula allows you to manipulate hair into any style with ease. Made with natural extracts and beeswax, it provides a touchable shape and texture that lasts throughout the day. Ideal for short styles, Molding Clay is also a great option for those seeking a more subtle fragrance. Additionally, it’s a favorite for individuals who engage in sports or experience heavy perspiration, as it helps maintain style and control even during intense activity.

title: CREAM POMADE
Description: American Crew's Cream Pomade is a moisture-rich natural look pomade that provides light to medium hold with a low shine finish. This versatile pomade tames hair while maintaining a soft, natural look, making it perfect for achieving a controlled yet effortless style. Ideal for men who prefer a subtle, low-shine finish, this natural look pomade helps create smooth, manageable hair without the heavy, greasy feel. Achieve a polished look that lasts all day with this easy-to-use styling product.

title: REVITALIZING TONER
Description: Soothes skin after shaving. Tones and refreshes just-shaved skin. Calms irritation produced by shaving. Moisturizes irritated areas and closes the pores providing freshness and relief.

title: PRECISION SHAVE GEL
Description: This transparent non-drying shave gel provides a close shave, soothes skin and helps alleviate irritation during shaving. Non-foaming gel designed for an accurate shave for normal or thin beard type. Provides a definitive, quick, and clean shave, allowing for smooth glide and enhanced control. This shave gel creates a protective layer on the skin, reducing friction and promoting a more comfortable shave with every use.

title: POST SHAVE COOLING LOTION
Description: Moisturizing shave relief lotion. Dual action formula works as a lightweight moisturizing and cooling aftershave. Helps restore skin balance. Benefits Moisturizes to provides relief from shaving. Helps restore skin balance. Usage After shaving for cooling, moisturizing relief. Smooth over face and neck. Can be used immediately after shaving or as a daily moisturizing lotion. Ingredients Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Maris Aqua (Sea Water (Eau De Mer)), Sodium Polyacrylate, Tocopherol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Bisabolol, Wheat Germ Glycerides, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Extract, Farnesol, Butylene Glycol, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Echinacea Angustifolia Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben.

title: 3-in-1 Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Wash
Description: Simplify your routine without sacrificing performance with American Crew 3-in-1 Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Wash. This ultimate multitasker cleanses and conditions hair while refreshing the body — ideal for the man who demands efficiency without compromise.

title: 3-IN-1 TEA TREE SHAMPOO, CONDITIONER & BODY WASH FOR MEN
Description: Streamline your grooming with American Crew 3-in-1 Tea Tree. Designed for men who crave efficiency and revitalization, this all-in-one formula cleanses and conditions hair while refreshing the skin. Enhanced with natural tea tree oil, it provides an invigorating, cooling effect, perfect for starting or ending your day feeling fresh.

title: 24 HOUR DEODORANT BODY WASH
Description: Discover the ultimate freshness with American Crew’s 24-Hour Deodorant Body Wash, a long lasting body wash for men designed to keep you smelling clean and confident from morning to night. This advanced formula delivers a powerful, deep cleanse while effectively neutralizing odor, leaving your skin feeling invigorated and refreshed. With its energizing fragrance and 24-hour odor protection, this body wash is perfect for men who demand all-day freshness and vitality. Whether you're starting your day or recovering from a workout, this long lasting body wash for men ensures you stay clean, confident, and revitalized. Ideal for daily use, American Crew’s 24-Hour Deodorant Body Wash combines performance with an unbeatable fragrance, keeping you at the top of your game.

title: ALTERNATOR FINISHING SPRAY
Description: Flexible Control Hair Styling Spray Provides a flexible style that gives you control of your image all day. Apply once, style anytime.

title: BOOST POWDER
Description: American Crew Boost Powder is an anti-gravity volume powder used to give hair lift, thickness, and a matte finish. This weightless hair texture powder adds grit for dramatic, gravity-defying texture, enhancing volume and body. Perfect for creating long-lasting, full styles, this hair texture powder is ideal for adding definition and structure. And, it can be layered with virtually any other American Crew styling product for even more texture and control.

title: DEFINING PASTE
Description: American Crew Defining Paste provides a medium hold with low shine for added texture or increased definition. The beeswax in this hair paste provides a natural, pliable hold for various lengths. The wax-like consistency of hair paste provides a matte finish while still remaining easy to distribute through hair. Defining Paste is similar to Fiber in texture and effects, but is easier to use and distribute throughout hair. It can also be used in hair that's beyond 2'' in length, providing flexibility and control for any style. Defining Paste is perfect for those looking for a versatile hair paste that creates definition and texture with a natural finish.

title: FIBER GROOMING FOAM
Description: Fiber Grooming Foam is a lightweight, fibrous hair foam that provides long-lasting manageable volume with medium hold and natural shine. This versatile foam for hair works well with medium to longer length hair, adding fullness and texture while keeping your style flexible and natural-looking. Perfect for achieving volume without weighing hair down, it gives a smooth, polished finish that lasts throughout the day.

title: Are We in Love Bearded Iris
Description: The elegantly frilled standards in peach to peach-pink contrast beautifully with soft pastel pink falls on this enchanting bearded iris. Are We in Love features striking tangerine-red beards and delicate central lines that add visual interest, while a gentle sweet fragrance enhances its appeal. Thriving in full sun, this stunning perennial reaches 37" in height and makes a spectacular addition to borders, raised beds or foundation plantings

title: Strawberry Swirl Carpet Border Lily
Description: Turn heads in your garden with this compact lily, flaunting generous white blooms edged in striking rosy red on robust stems. Perfect for containers or front borders, it attracts pollinators and returns reliably each year with minimal fuss. Let the foliage die back naturally in autumn, and the bulbs will reward you with fresh plants the following spring.

title: Premiere Amaryllis Bulb
Description: Reliably produces two to three sturdy stems topped with big, rounded cranberry-red blooms. Each 6–8" wide flower adds vibrant colour and drama.

title: English Lavender
Description: English Lavender offers yearround charm with fragrant, silvery foliage and months of violetblue flowers in the form of 8" spikes. Irresistible to pollinators, it is ideal for edging, drying and fresh-cut bouquets. This hardy, drought-tolerant perennial forms neat, aromatic mounds over time. Commonly used in soaps and perfumes.

title: Double Love Lily
Description: Fully double, pollen-free blooms measure up to 6½" across and feature layers of rich orange petals with dramatic wine-red speckles at the centre. The extra petals give Double Love’s up-facing flowers a lush, full shape while eliminating the mess of pollen.

title: Souvenir de Maxime Cornu Tree Peony
Description: Big, showy blossoms in shifting shades of yellow, pink, orange and red give this tree peony real presence in mid to late spring. The flowers can reach up to 8" in diameter and carry a light scent, though their stems may need support. Try planting it on a raised terrace or slope where the blooms can be admired from below. Among the earliest yellow tree peony hybrids, and still a standout today. This item ships in spring 2026.

title: Versicolor Geranium
Description: Masses of crisp white, 1" flowers etched with fine violet veins smother this vigorous bushy geranium, drawing in butterflies while leaving browsing deer unimpressed. Its lobed, slightly hairy foliage knits together quickly to form a neat, weedsuppressing carpet that slips just as easily into gaps in rockeries as it does a patio pot. Hardy and easy going, it brings season-long texture and colour wherever you need low-maintenance ground cover.

title: The New Gardener's Handbook
Description: Whether you’re just starting out or looking to refine your skills, The New Gardener’s Handbook is your go-to guide for cultivating a thriving and beautiful garden. Written by expert horticulturist Daryl Beyers, this essential resource covers the fundamental principles of successful gardening, from soil preparation and plant selection to watering techniques and pest management. Packed with practical advice, stunning visuals, and step-by-step instructions, this book simplifies complex gardening concepts to help beginners build confidence while also offering valuable insights for experienced gardeners. With a focus on sustainability and plant health, The New Gardener’s Handbook ensures that your garden not only flourishes but also contributes to a healthier environment. Why You’ll Love This Book: •	Beginner-Friendly Guidance – Easy-to-follow advice on everything from soil health to seasonal care. •	Comprehensive Knowledge – Covers essential gardening principles, including planting, pruning, and fertilizing. •	Beautifully Illustrated – Engaging visuals make it easy to understand techniques and best practices. •	Sustainable Practices – Learn eco-friendly methods to grow a healthy, resilient garden. Perfect for new and aspiring gardeners, The New Gardener’s Handbook is a must-have resource for creating and maintaining a flourishing garden with confidence.

title: Candied Ginger Bearded Iris
Description: Simply one of the finest iris plants you’ll find, combining strong, upright stems with healthy foliage that holds up beautifully through the season. The 4½" ruffled blooms blend warm ginger tones with brick red falls and orange beards.

title: Black Dragon Tree Peony
Description: Deep pink-red blooms with a lavender haze and golden centres give this woody peony real punch. The ample 6–7" flowers are lightly scented and open right at the branch tips. Use Black Dragon as a bold specimen planting, massed in borders or near a walkway where its rich tones can really stand out. This item ships in spring 2026.

title: Coffee Trader Bearded Iris
Description: With its rich blend of milky coffee tones and violet accents, this variety delivers an exceptional and unusual colour combination that stands out in the garden. The medium-size, heavily ruffled blooms feature bright orange beards and a soft, sweet fragrance that adds to their appeal. Blooms appear in late midseason and are ideal for both borders and cut arrangements.

title: The Best Inkstone Tree Peony
Description: Marvel at this extraordinary plant, which dazzles with luscious double flowers in a rich, deep crimson that command attention in any sunny spot. Its branching habit and intricately dissected green foliage provide architectural interest even when not in full bloom, making it a standout choice for gardeners seeking dramatic perennial impact. Perfectly suited for creating stunning fence line displays, sunny patio edges or as a focal point in woodland-style garden borders, this deciduous shrub offers both visual spectacle and delicate fragrance. This item ships in spring 2026.

title: Men are from Mars Bearded Iris
Description: This adaptable award winner delivers strikingly hued blooms—muted gold standards with subtle white veining in the outer third, paired with lilac falls accented by chestnut and tan tones. The richly fragrant flowers create stunning vertical interest while the hardy rhizomes multiply annually. One of the healthiest and most floriferous bearded irises available!

title: Lizzy Tulip
Description: These charming dwarf tulips paint the early-spring garden with dramatic star-shaped blooms in deep crimson, each featuring a distinctive black centre elegantly bordered by greenish-yellow edges. Rising just 6–8" from the ground, Lizzy’s pointed buds emerge close to earth before gracefully extending upward, making them perfect for naturalizing in rock gardens, along walkways or beneath deciduous trees.

title: Mayfair Melody Reblooming Bearded Iris
Description: Soft pink standards and violet falls give this fragrant iris a refined, painterly look, with burnt bronze-tangerine beards adding warmth. It’s a reblooming variety, so you may enjoy its well-formed flowers more than once in a season. Ideal for borders, paths or cutting for indoor arrangements.

title: Award Winning Hosta Collection
Description: These varieties have been recognized for their exceptional traits, such as vibrant foliage, strong growth and reliable performance. This collection includes one each of the following five varieties: Patriot Hosta: Its striking dark green leaves have extra-wide margins that start out creamy yellow before maturing to bright white. The slightly wavy foliage is slug resistant and handles sunlight well. Lavender blooms open on 30" scapes. Winner of the Award of Garden Merit and a former Hosta of the Year! Halcyon Hosta: Rich metallic blue fits in anywhere you need an eye-catching display of hue and habit. This vigorous grower creates tidy foliage mounds topped with soft lavender blooms—it’s one of the heaviest-blooming hostas on the market. Sum and Substance Hosta: Extra tall and extra wide, this is one of the largest hostas available. It easily fills shady spaces with lush, light green foliage and delicate lilac blooms throughout the season. Soft yellow highlights add dimension to the broad leaves. Look closely and you’ll also observe the nearblack “noses” that emerge from the soil in spring. Sieboldiana Elegans Hosta: Just the ticket when you’re looking for a large, long-lived perennial to bring shade gardens and darkened borders into the light. Thick, slug-resistant, puckered leaves are extra-long—up to 20"—and feature a distinctively wavy texture. The smoky blue colour contrasts beautifully with the pale lavender to white blooms in summer. Stained Glass Hosta: A multiple award winner with a beautiful foliage form, Stained Glass also happens to be very sun tolerant! It illuminates even the darkest corners with vivid gold leaves accented with deep green margins. Long leaves reach an impressive 10½" in length and form neat mounds that look amazing in shade gardens, borders and containers. Fragrant, pale lavender flowers attract butterflies!

title: Soprano Tulip
Description: Turn your garden into a vibrant spectacle with stunning blooms that boast deep red petals adorned with delicate yellow edges. The Soprano Tulip stands at an impressive 16–18" tall. The compact 2–2½" blooms make a charming addition wherever they are used.

title: Snow Fox Giant Snowdrops
Description: These larger-than-usual snowdrops bring winter to life with honey-scented, bell-shaped, nodding white flowers featuring elegant green markings and a soft olive-green ovary.

title: Chasing Destiny Bearded Iris
Description: Towering iris commands attention with ethereal lilac-to lavender standards floating above rosy lilac falls. Delicate chevron patterns and vibrant tangerine beards add dramatic flair.

title: Lowland's White Astilbe
Description: This early blooming shade perennial features full, creamy white plumes brushed with pale green, held above a tidy mound of finely divided dark foliage. It thrives in moisture-retentive soil and partial shade but shows impressive tolerance for heat and dry spells once established. Excellent planted in drifts to brighten up shady beds or borders, and just as appealing in a vase—fresh or dried.

title: Monkey Business Hosta
Description: Elegant arching foliage with wide chartreuse margins and deep green centres is held aloft by striking red petioles, adding a bold touch to shady borders. This medium sized, one of a kind hosta grows up to 18" tall and produces light lavender, bell-shaped blooms in midsummer that attract pollinators. In the photo at right, Monkey Business breeder Arie Blom is seen admiring one of his "babies"!

title: Hugs and Kisses Tulip
Description: From demure green buds to a finale of rosy pink, this enchanting tulip puts on quite a show. Each bloom transitions through soft yellow and ivory before developing a subtle pink edge, eventually maturing to a full blush of pink and red hues.

title: Beluga Giant Snowdrops
Description: In bloom by February, this new cultivar shows off oversized, bell-shaped white blooms with gently curved outer petals— often three to a bulb. Looks best planted in generous drifts.

title: Burgundy Bohemian Bearded Iris
Description: Large, frilled blooms make a bold statement with golden standards, velvety burgundy falls, and vivid orange beards highlighted by yellow and white markings. This richly coloured iris adds drama to borders and makes a striking addition to spring bouquets. A regal choice for gardeners who love warm, saturated tones. Bred exclusively for Breck’s by our own Christian Bédard.

title: Sangria Splash Reblooming Daylily
Description: Perfectly suited for foundation plantings or as vibrant accents in perennial borders, this reblooming cultivar produces abundant 4" blooms in rich, reddish-purple hues. Each petal of this attention-getter is dramatically outlined with intricate yellow ruffles and complemented by a lively chartreuse centre. Robust growth and a strong bud count ensure reliable summer colour.

title: La Scala Bearded Iris
Description: Award-winning La Scala showcases a complex palette worthy of its operatic namesake. Greyed pinkish-lavender standards blend into violet-orchid centres above pale pink falls with creamy highlights and peach-flushed hafts. Striking flame-coloured beards with white tips complete this 37" tall beauty. Perfect for borders, pathways or raised beds where its ruffled blooms create maximum impact. Plant in groups to enjoy as cut flowers, bringing its scene-stealing elegance from garden to vase.

title: Thank Your Lucky Stars Reblooming Daylily
Description: Fragrant, plum-purple blooms with dark halos and bright white midribs give this standout daylily serious garden presence. A reliable rebloomer, it puts on a strong show twice a year, every year. Flowers reach 6" across and carry a sweet scent. Hardy and award winning, it’s a natural pick for borders, sunny slopes or foundation plantings.

title: My Lady's Manor Bearded Iris
Description: Beautifully ruffled petals in soft blue-white shades give this tall iris a refined presence, with delicate veining and small, hidden green-tan markings on the hafts adding quiet complexity. Its distinctive colouring is further augmented by multicoloured beards in white, yellow and pale blue. This multiple-award recipient brings height and elegance to gardens and enhances fresh-cut arrangements.

title: Double-Flowered Dropwort
Description: Creamy white double flowers, blushed pink before opening, float above a feathery base of fernlike foliage on this elegant clump-forming perennial. It puts on a generous summer-long display of sprays of dainty flowers. Despite this dropwort’s refined look, it’s surprisingly low maintenance. A charming and underused plant that deserves a spot in mixed borders or naturalistic designs. Deer and rabbits tend to ignore it, but pollinators cannot.

title: Foxtail Lily Mixture
Description: These tall, showy bloomers bring vertical flair and soft colour to sunny garden beds. Each slender spike is packed with hundreds of tiny, nectar-rich florets in random shades of yellow, orange and pink—irresistible to pollinators but ignored by deer. Colourful foxtail lilies can thrive undisturbed for more than a decade, making them a low-maintenance, long term garden feature. Varieties are not individually labeled. Eremurus ‘Shelford Hybrids Mix’

title: Drumstick Yellow Coneflower
Description: With a compact, upright habit and remarkably strong stems, this drought-tolerant coneflower makes a striking addition to sunny beds and borders. Its unusual orange-yellow cones are petal free, giving the blooms a sculptural, modern look that holds up well in the garden or a vase. Plants grow to up to 28" and produce multiple stems topped with long-lasting blooms that are a hit with pollinators. Hairy foliage adds texture, and the extended bloom time keeps the display going through the season.

title: Hunter Morn Daffodil
Description: This unusual daffodil opens in early to mid spring with nodding, soft yellow-green blooms that gradually fade to clear white. With two to four fragrant, 3" flowers per stem and a long bloom time, it’s a lovely way to add subtle drama to the season’s early show. Bred in New Zealand by daffodil expert John A. Hunter, its elegant form and shifting tones are well-suited for use in borders, naturalized areas and floral arrangements.

title: Speedwell Mixture
Description: A versatile blend of pink, white and blue blooms brings lasting summer colour to beds, borders and containers. These tidy, upright plants grow to about 18–24" tall and produce long, branching flower spikes that are great for cutting. Their bright green, lance-shaped leaves keep things looking fresh even when the flowers are done. Perennial by nature, they return year after year in average to moist soils. Varieties are not individually labeled.

title: Robbedoes Tulip
Description: This extraordinary Darwinhybrid tulip captivates with its deeply incised, brilliant red petals, which appear almost artistically carved around a sunny yellow centre. Reaching up to 24" in height, Robbedoes (Dutch for “rascal”) brings reliable drama to spring gardens, naturalizing beautifully to provide years of returns on your initial planting. Its sturdy stems make it an excellent cut flower, while its unique aesthetic pairs wonderfully with classic tulip varieties. Plant en masse along walkways, in mixed borders or naturalized in drifts through woodland gardens. For maximum impact, pair with complementary yellow tulips like Golden Leo or underplant with lungworts to create a stunning spring tapestry.

title: Elliot Blueberry Hedge
Description: Known for being the last to ripen, thus extending the season all the way into September. Begins setting fruit early, in 2nd or 3rd year. Also known for its tart/sweet flavor which some people love, and others "turn their nose up at"! It is widely grown, so it must not be too bad! Firm berries are excellent for freezing. 4-6 feet tall. Yellow/orange to red and purple fall color. Recommended for zones 5-7. Harvest in late season (In Southwestern Michigan beginning approximately August 25th, earlier in warmer zones)

title: Heaven Can Wait™ Blackberry Plant
Description: Extended harvest period starting in mid-June More health-promoting antioxidants than other blackberries Thornless canes are self supporting With so many health-promoting vitamins, antioxidants and fiber packed into every Heaven Can Wait Blackberry, you'll feel like time is on your side. Not only is this one of the most healthful blackberries you can grow, it's also one of the easiest to maintain. Thornless, self-supporting canes mature to a manageable 4-8 ft. height, and berry clusters are easily accessible from the outer edges of the plants. Heaven Can Wait is self-pollinating and thrives in zones 5-8, with an extended fruiting period that starts in mid-June. PPAF.

title: 5’ x 15’ Soft Mesh Clematis Trellis
Description: This soft, flexible mesh offers reliable support without damaging tender stems or blooms, making it perfect for clematis, wisterias, nasturtiums, peas and other climbing or vining plants. The non-abrasive material gently cradles foliage and flowers as they grow, preventing breakage or bruising. Use it vertically on a wall or wooden fence to turn a flat surface into a living tapestry. The white nylon mesh is sturdy and long lasting, with generous 6" square openings that provide easy access for pruning and training. This item is a practical choice for both ornamental and edible gardens, and simple to install wherever climbing plants need guidance.

title: Edge of Night Mondo Grass
Description: Deep black foliage with subtle white striping Forms a dense, spreading carpet over time Deer resistant, drought tolerant, and low maintenance Edge of Night Mondo Grass Add bold style to your garden with Edge of Night Mondo Grass. This refined selection of black mondo grass features dark, glossy foliage accented by a narrow white edge—offering crisp contrast that elevates shady spaces and modern planting schemes. Low-growing and dense, it's ideal for borders, containers, or between stepping stones. Subtle Color, Serious Contrast: Edge of Night’s variegated leaves aren’t flashy, but they make a statement. The sleek black blades catch the light while the narrow white edge adds definition—giving your garden a tailored, high-end look even in shaded spots. Built for Groundcover Performance: This variety spreads slowly to form a dense mat, making it a dependable choice for edging paths, filling between stones, or planting en masse. Its low profile keeps it tidy and contained, without crowding other plants. Withstands Tough Conditions: Edge of Night is as practical as it is beautiful. It tolerates partial shade, resists deer browsing, and stays strong during dry spells. This makes it an excellent option for low-effort landscapes or high-traffic garden areas.

title: Sword Dance Peony
Description: Prepare to be amazed by this award winning peony, which delivers a dramatic garden performance with its stunning Japanese-style flowers. Vibrant magenta-red petals pirouette around a mesmerizing centre of predominantly yellow staminodes streaked with passionate red. The result is a captivating display that'll stop garden visitors in their tracks. Ideal for mixed borders or as a striking specimen plant, this robust bush boasts glossy deep green foliage that provides visual interest well beyond its long flowering period.

title: Falcon Pride Bearded Iris
Description: Captivating blue-violet petals fade to soft azure at the edges, giving Falcon Pride its distinctive charm. Award winning and sweetly fragrant, it has deservedly become more popular among iris aficionados since being introduced in 2007. Plant this cultivar in a place of prominence where its colour, scent and strong form can be fully appreciated. Height: 40"

title: Nick Shaylor Peony
Description: Blooming in late season, this multiple award-winning peony puts on an exceptional performance in borders, feature beds and cutting gardens. Large flowers of light blush pink flaunt a fully double form. Plants have stiff stems and are not susceptible to botrytis. Some red flecks will show up on the blooms as a nice embellishment. Winner of the APS Gold Medal in 1941 and 1972!

title: Winter Walz Bearded Iris
Description: Sturdy stems that grow to a considerable height support ruffled, icy blue flowers with complementary violet-blue beards. Perfect for use in fresh-cut spring bouquets and arrangements.

title: National Velvet Tulip
Description: Resplendent in deep crimson-red, these sophisticated tulips create an unforgettable mid-spring display with their sumptuous, velvety petals that beg to be touched. Rising gracefully up to 20" tall on strong stems that resist wind and rain, National Velvet produces long lasting blooms that work wonderfully in both formal garden settings and naturalistic designs. Plant en masse along pathways where their rich colour can be appreciated up close, or group them in large clusters near contrasting yellow or white flowers.

title: Snowball Viburnum
Description: Shrubs are a must-have for gardens, and the Snowball Viburnum hedge is one of our favorites. Its showy, white, 5-8 in. flowerheads add charm in early summer and seem to glow in the moonlight. The non-fragrant flowers emerge lime green and turn a snowy white, and attract butterflies. A native of China, the Snowball Viburnum hedge has dark green, ovate leaves. It's a deciduous shrub in northern climates, and can be semi-evergreen in warmer grow zones. Growing 6-8 ft. tall with a similar spread, the Snowball bush has a rounded, vase-shaped habit. It's a top choice for growing as a flowering hedge, backdrop for perennials or as a privacy screen. It tolerates a wide range of soils. For best results, plant your Snowball viburnum hedge in well-drained, acidic loamy soil in full sun to partial shade.

title: Golden Leo Tulip
Description: A true botanical rebel, this Darwinhybrid tulip captivates with its deeply slashed golden petals, occasionally brushed with mysterious red streaks. Standing proudly at 22" to 24" tall, Golden Leo’s dramatically serrated blooms bring avant garde flair to traditional spring gardens and make striking cut flowers. Unlike many tulips that fade after a season, this reliable performer naturalizes readily, multiplying to create larger displays each year.

title: Henry Bockstoce Peony
Description: A very striking, very fragrant, very large peony! Its giant, double flowers are formed from rounded petals and gorgeously hued in a deep cardinal red. The flower’s centre is shaped like a rose. The tall, 40" stems are strong but may require some support during periods of poor weather. Henry Bockstoce is one of the most beautiful peonies available and makes a terrific cut flower.

title: Wizard of Odds Bearded Iris
Description: A standout in any border or vase, this fragrant, multiple award-winning iris puts on a mesmerizing show with bright gold petals unpredictably streaked, splashed or blended with ruby red. No two flowers are alike, making it an attention-getter everywhere it is on display. Warm yellow-to-orange beards complete the colour show. With its vibrant, ruffled blooms, this iris is a natural choice for a flamboyant planting scheme.

title: Velvet Vortex Reblooming Daylily
Description: Presenting a striking daylily with bold colour contrasts that command attention. Each 6½" bloom features vivid pinkish-rose petals edged in dark, near-black ruffles, framing a dramatic, deep burgundy to blackish-purple eye zone. A bright yellow throat glows at the centre. Makes a stunning focal point in the garden.

title: Whiskey Tango Bearded Iris
Description: Presenting a Breck’s exclusive directly from our own breeding program! Whiskey Tango is a prolific bloomer whose heavily ruffled flowers are a warm caramel-orange colour. Bright orange beards are surrounded by a reddish-brown patch with delicate white striping. Brightens any border or arrangement.

title: Rum and Coke Bearded Iris
Description: It’s ruffled cream standards, edged in golden brown and traced with fine veining, rise above bold burgundyplum falls touched with violet at the heart. More than just eye-catching, this resilient iris holds steady in rough weather thanks to its strong, storm-ready stems. The recipient of two major iris awards, Rum and Coke is a spirited choice for springtime borders or floral displays.

title: Maurice Lepeletier Stake
Description: Our Heirloom Roses metal weather-resistant 16" ground stakes have an engravable faceplate measuring 3.75" wide by 1.5" tall. Ground stakes are incredibly durable and will withstand the elements for many years.

title: Mistral Milka
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Mistral Milka is a gorgeous lavender-purple Anemone with water color brushstrokes on her petals and a deeply colored eye. Anemones are excellent cut flowers, deer resistant, and a pollinator favorite. Each corm can produce up to 10+ flowers. Succession planting is recommended to keep them blooming all season long. Mistral Milka is sold in packs of 10 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Plant in fall for Zones 7–9 and in spring after the last frost for zones 4-6. Growers in zones 4-6 will need to dig and dry corms yearly and replant in the spring. 1. Soak Corms in room-temperature water for 4–6 hours before planting. 2. Choose a full sun to part shade location and well-drained soil. Amend with compost if needed. 3. Plant corms 2–3" deep and space 3–6" apart. 4. Water after planting and keep the soil moist but not soggy using a low-nitrogen fertilizer when shoots and buds appear.

title: Elegance Bianco 200b
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Elegance Bianco is a stunning Italian Ranunculus with pure white, rose-like blooms made of tightly layered petals. Flowers measure 3–4" across on strong 12–16" stems, perfect for cutting. It blooms in late spring to early summer and grows as a perennial in Zones 8–10. In Zones 4–7, corms should be lifted, dried, and replanted each spring. Deer resistant and known for its high bloom count and clean, classic look. Elegance Bianco is sold in packs of 10. Planting Instructions: Plant Ranunculus in the fall for zones 8-11 for spring blooms. In zones 4-7, store the hardened corms in a cool, dark place and plant in early spring for mid-summer blooms. Soak corms in room temperature water for 3-4 hours; avoid oversoaking. Choose an area with full sun for planting. Add compost and a balanced fertilizer to your soil. Plant corms 9” apart, 2-3” deep, with tentacles facing down in the soil. Water after planting and continue weekly watering to ensure the corms do not dry out for the remainder of the growing season.

title: Innovator
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Innovator stands out with creamy white petals and a flared, deep coral-pink cup that softens at the edges. Blooming in mid-spring on sturdy 16–18" stems, it adds vibrant contrast to garden beds and cut arrangements. Deer resistant and hardy in Zones 3–8. Innovator is sold in packs of 10 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area with partial to full sun that has good drainage. Dig a hole 6-8 inches deep and mix granular fertilizer with soil at the bottom of the hole. Daffodil bulbs should be planted 6” below the soil line. Place bulbs 2-3 inches apart with points facing upward, and then gently pack the soil over the bulb. Water once and then not again till spring.

title: Raspberry Cupcake™
Description: Another highly disease-resistant Kordes rose! Raspberry Cupcake™ is a deliciously fragrant Hybrid Tea that smells like a raspberry and lemon teacake. Her medium pink blooms rebloom all season long and open in cup form to reveal 65+ large petals. Expect her to average 4’ x 2-3’ and be an excellent choice for a cutting garden.

title: Casimir Moullé
Description: SAVE THE RAMBLERS: Originally introduced in 1910 in France, Casimir Moullé is a vigorous climbing Rambler that easily reaches heights of 20’. She does well when given space and sunlight to grow and a support to hold her up. She would also climb well into a large tree. She produces raspberry pink, medium blooms with a paler reverse. These flowers are borne in clusters for a spectacular spring or summer flush, followed by scattered blooms throughout the season. Casimir Moullé has long flexible canes excellent for training on any structure. Casimir Moullé is a rare Rambler that has previously not been available commercially in the US. We are partnering with the American Rose Society (ARS) to save these nearly extinct ramblers from Anne Belovich’s personal rose collection with the goal of having this rose in three public gardens and at least 30 private collections. A portion of the proceeds of the sale of this rose will go back to the ARS’ Save the Ramblers initiative to further support the work of preserving these nearly extinct ramblers. Have you purchased this rose? Please consider registering it with the American Rose Society to help us Save the Ramblers.

title: Whiskey Tango
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Whiskey Tango is a new bearded Iris variety with large, ruffled blooms in warm caramel-orange. Each flower features a reddish-brown patch near the center with fine white striping and a bright orange beard. It blooms in mid to late spring on strong 36" stems. Hardy in Zones 4–9, deer resistant, and an eye-catching choice for cut flowers. Whiskey Tango is sold in packs of 3 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area that gets at least 6 hours of sunlight and has good drainage. Plant with the rhizome’s top exposed at the surface of the soil and firmly pack the soil around each rhizome. Space Iris rhizomes 12-24” apart. Water after planting and continue watering at least once a week for the remainder of the growing season.

title: Harvest of Memories
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Harvest of Memories is a bright yellow bearded Iris that blooms in late spring and then again in late summer to early fall. Its clear, golden petals and sunny coloring stand out in any garden. A reliable rebloomer, it offers more color than most varieties. It grows about 36" tall, is lightly fragrant, and performs well as a cut flower. Hardy in Zones 3–9 and deer resistant. Harvest of Memories is sold in packs of 3 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area that gets at least 6 hours of sunlight and has good drainage. Plant with the rhizome’s top exposed at the surface of the soil and firmly pack the soil around each rhizome. Space Iris rhizomes 12-24” apart. Water after planting and continue watering at least once a week for the remainder of the growing season.

title: Drama Queen
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Drama Queen is an award-winning bearded Iris known for its bold color and oversized blooms. It has deep purple standards and golden-buff falls streaked with wine-red veins. Rusty orange beards stand out against the dark tones. The flowers are large and frilly, making a big impact in the garden. Blooming in mid-spring on tall 38" stems, it's hardy in Zones 4–9, deer resistant, and great for cut flowers. Drama Queen is sold in packs of 3 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area that gets at least 6 hours of sunlight and has good drainage. Plant with the rhizome’s top exposed at the surface of the soil and firmly pack the soil around each rhizome. Space Iris rhizomes 12-24” apart. Water after planting and continue watering at least once a week for the remainder of the growing season.

title: Clarence
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Clarence is a reblooming, tall Bearded Iris with icy pale blue-to-white standards and rich blue falls edged in dark navy. The softly ruffled blooms pack a sweet fragrance and appear in mid-spring, then bloom again in late summer to early fall, giving you two seasons of color. It grows about 35″ tall, is hardy in Zones 3–9, deer resistant, and makes an excellent choice for cut flowers. Clarence is sold in packs of 3 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area that gets at least 6 hours of sunlight and has good drainage. Plant with the rhizome’s top exposed at the surface of the soil and firmly pack the soil around each rhizome. Space Iris rhizomes 12-24” apart. Water after planting and continue watering at least once a week for the remainder of the growing season.

title: Aztec Art
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Aztec Art is a striking bearded Iris that grabs attention with sunny yellow upper petals and deep mahogany lower petals, each featuring a bold yellow sunburst and fiery orange-gold beard. It blooms in early to mid‑late spring (May) on tall, sturdy 33″ stems, offering a dramatic color show. Hardy in Zones 4–9, this iris is deer resistant and makes a powerful cut flower. Aztec Art is sold in packs of 3 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area that gets at least 6 hours of sunlight and has good drainage. Plant with the rhizome’s top exposed at the surface of the soil and firmly pack the soil around each rhizome. Space Iris rhizomes 12-24” apart. Water after planting and continue watering at least once a week for the remainder of the growing season.

title: Lady Jane
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Lady Jane is a large-flowered daffodil making her first appearance in the U.S. this season. She blooms on thick, upright stems that can reach up to 24" tall and flowers later in the spring than most daffodils. Each bloom features creamy yellow petals with splashes of brighter coral-orange in the center for a truly beautiful flower. Hardy in Zones 3–8, Lady Jane’s unique size and form make her a standout among new daffodil introductions, especially in borders, spring displays, or cut arrangements. Lady Jane is sold in packs of 10 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Choose an area with partial to full sun that has good drainage. Dig a hole 6-8” deep and mix granular fertilizer with soil at the bottom of the hole. Daffodil bulbs should be planted 6” below the soil line. Place bulbs 2-3” apart with points facing upward, and then gently pack the soil over the bulb. Water once and then not again till spring.

title: Mistral Tigre
Description: Note: Bulbs ship starting in October based on availability and your zone, unlike other products. Plant around or after your first frost but before the ground freezes. Growing 10-14” tall, Mistral Tigre Anemone is a vibrant bi-color flower with bright pops of red and creamy white. Anemones are excellent cut flowers, deer resistant, and a pollinator favorite. Each corm can produce up to 10+ flowers. Succession planting is recommended to keep them blooming all season long. Mistral Tigre is sold in packs of 10 for fall planting. Planting Instructions: Plant in fall for Zones 7–9 and in spring after the last frost for zones 4-6. Growers in zones 4-6 will need to dig and dry corms yearly and replant in the spring. 1. Soak Corms in room-temperature water for 4–6 hours before planting. 2. Choose a full sun to part shade location and well-drained soil. Amend with compost if needed. 3. Plant corms 2–3" deep and space 3–6" apart. 4. Water after planting and keep the soil moist but not soggy using a low-nitrogen fertilizer when shoots and buds appear.

title: Uptown Girl™
Description: Uptown Girl™ is a bright pink-peach Grandiflora with vibrant quartered flowers set against dark green foliage. Her cupped blooms emit a fruit and true rose fragrance. We love her painted petals that gently fade at the edges and her darker reverse. Expect this 3 ½’ x 3 ½’ plant to produce long stems with single blooms or clusters. Bring Uptown Girl’s ruffled beauty inside to enjoy her in vases all over the house.

Description: Add a splash of color to your next gift. Perfect for a Birthday, Thank You or any occasion. Includes 12 large, luscious berries, dipped in two kinds of Belgian chocolate (milk, and white) are exquisitely hand- decorated in colorful drizzle and sprinkle designs for your confectionery pleasure. Crafted by artisans in a small batch kitchen, no two will looks exactly the same. This gift will ship overnight for optimal freshness. Dimensions: 10" x 7" x 3"

title: Ultimate Belgian Chocolate-Covered Pretzels
Description: Send a box of 12 playfully decorated pretzels for a birthday or any occasion. Each pretzel is enrobed in Belgian milk chocolate, for the perfect balance of salty and sweet. Then hand-decorated with chocolate drizzle, colorful sprinkles and candy. Crafted by artisans in a small batch kitchen, no two will looks exactly the same. This gift will ship overnight for optimal freshness. Dimensions: 7.75" x 7.75" x 2.25"

title: Belgian Chocolate Strawberries & Nibblers® Pop Combo
Description: The perfect pairing: tantalizingly sweet strawberries and Nibblers® bite-sized cookie pops! Both delicious treats are completely covered in Belgian dark, milk and white chocolate and then hand-decorated with pastel colored drizzle and sprinkles. Each shipment includes an assortment of 6 chocolate covered strawberries and 6 chocolate Nibbler® cookie pops. Crafted by artisans in a small batch kitchen; no two will look exactly the same. Includes: 6 perfectly ripe large strawberries 6 delicious mini cheesecake bites This gift will ship overnight for optimal freshness. Dimensions: 10" x 7" x 3"

title: Thank You Rice Krispie Mini Gift Box
Description: Send a Thank You message with this gift box of 12 mini rice krispie treats that are pull-apart gooey goodness. Treats arrive in a Treat House gift box with Mrs. Fields red gift ribbon. All rice krispie treats are hand-made and uniquely decorated just for you. Dimensions: 14.5x6x2.5"

title: Dozen Sea Salt Belgian Chocolate Strawberries with Caramel
Description: How to make the best even better...Take a dozen luscious strawberries, put a nugget of caramel inside each one, dip in Belgian chocolate and sprinkle with sea salt! Crafted by artisans in a small batch kitchen, no two will looks exactly the same. This gift will ship overnight for optimal freshness. Dimensions: 10x7x3

title: Birthday Belgian Chocolate Nibblers® Cookie Grams
Description: It's a Birthday celebration with our 14 Nibblers® bite-sized cookies, enrobed in rich Belgian dark & milk chocolate. Each Nibbler is then hand-decorated with sprinkles, candy and white chocolate "Birthday" message. Crafted by artisans in a small batch kitchen; no two will look exactly the same. Disclaimer: This gift will ship overnight for optimal freshness. Dimensions: 16x5x1

title: Pop-Up Fresh Fruit Bowl
Description: A refreshingly fun presentation, this novelty vintage design converts from an apple-shaped wooden trivet to a three-dimensional basket for tabletop or hanging display. Shipped with a colorful selection of fresh fruit which includes 2 oranges 3 apples 3 pears 2 lemon 2 lime 2-3 mandarins 2 kiwi Dimensions: 13.75" x 10.38" x 3.75 Weight: 6 lbs

title: Happy Birthday Fruit & Treats Gift Box
Description: Give this perfect pairing of fresh fruit and treats to a loved one for their birthday. This deluxe gift comes with 2 Braeburn Apples, 2 Green D’ Anjou Pears, 2 Navel Oranges,, 3 oz Salt Water Taffy, 3 oz Mint Chocolate Malt Balls, 3 oz. Gummy Peach Rings, and 3 oz Strawberry Drops. 2x Braeburn Apples, 2x Green D’Anjou Pears 2x Navel Oranges 3oz Salt Water Taffy 3oz Mint Chocolate Malt Balls 3oz Gummy Peach Rings 3oz Strawberry Drops Dimensions: 11" x 11" x 4"Weight: 5 lbs

title: Get Well Rice Krispie Mini Gift Box
Description: Our "Get Well Soon" deluxe assortment is like sunshine in a box with 12 mini rice krispie treats that are pull-apart gooey goodness. Treats arrive in a Treat House gift box with Mrs. Fields red gift ribbon. All rice krispie treats are hand-made and uniquely decorated just for you. Dimensions: 14.5" x 6" x 2.5"

title: Birthday Rice Krispie Mini Gift Box
Description: The rice krispie Birthday Bash Box is like your very own party in a box! This gift includes 12 mini rice krispie treats that are pull-apart gooey goodness. Treats arrive in a Treat House gift box with Mrs. Fields red gift ribbon. All rice krispie treats are hand-made and uniquely decorated just for you. This gift is gluten-free. Dimensions: 14.5x6x2.5

title: Thank You Fruit Trio Gift Box
Description: The perfect trio of fresh fruit for a Thank You gift. Comes beautifully displayed with a hand-tied red Thank You ribbon. 4x Comice Pears 4x Braeburn Apples 2lbs Mandarins

title: 10" Pineapple Coconut Coffee Cake
Description: Try something a little more exotic with our Pineapple Coconut Coffee Cake. The newest addition to our line-up of cakes combine beautiful flakes of pure coconut and perfectly ripe pineapple chunks. The result is a combination of outstanding flavor and luxurious taste. Baked with the freshest ingredients. Also available in 8" rounds. Each cake is baked with the freshest ingredients.

title: 8" Pineapple Coconut Coffee Cake
Description: Try something a little more exotic with our Pineapple Coconut Coffee Cake. The newest addition to our line-up of cakes combine beautiful flakes of pure coconut and perfectly ripe pineapple chunks. The result is a combination of outstanding flavor and luxurious taste.
