If he wants the bite, he’s got to delight.The Lure Making Kit gives him the gear and guidance to mix and mold tantalizing, one-of-a-kind lures that’ll entice even the most prudent of fish.Tools for the Tackle: In partnership with Lure Craft, Man Crates has commissioned three exclusive injection molds to make delicious fish food shapes: crawdaddy, mudbug, and worm. Tasty! The pint of plastisol and individual ounces of coloring, glitter, and scent is everything he’ll need to mix and mold stunning works of aquatic art. The Man Crates exclusive Lure Making Guide has step-by-step instructions for designing and deploying the perfect lures. It also has information on how to re-mold the imperfect lures...just in case. We’ve got fun diabolical wrapping options for every occasion. Add one during checkout to make his gift extra special!

title: Pit Master Crate
Description: Story Set Smoker To Beast ModeWhen the divine spirits of the Ancient World demanded animal sacrifices to satiate their celestial hunger, it was never a quick, "kill it and grill it" job.Nay, they ordered full mammoth carcasses be slow-cooked for days over glowing coals in a smoky trap of rubs and sauces. This great wisdom was called "barbecue", and it pleased the gods so greatly that they indulged...perhaps a bit too much.The Woolies are long gone, but the archaic secrets of True Barbecue live on in the Pit Master Man Crate. Heat, Eat, RepeatThe Pit Master Crate is the Mr. Miyagi of barbecue gear, your guiding sensei on the road to fall-off-the-bone, "low & slow" True Barbecue mastery.Keep your eyebrows intact with the barbecue fork, or go face to the fire with premium leather gloves intended to handle the densest meat and most intense heat.Meat Claws are the supreme tools for lifting and lugging huge roasts, whether you've dug a backyard pit to "go whole hog" or drained and lined your swimming pool to "go whole herd". Knuckle up with these stainless steel shredders, and you're just a few impassioned Wolverine impressions away from pristine pulled pork. Sauce Like A Boss A poorly executed saucing strategy can make or break your barbecue, and we're firmly in the "sauce while hot" camp. Glaze right over the blaze using our premium leather gloves and grill gear. We've included Honey Chipotle and Honey flavors to bring the bottled best to your cookout, the perfect complement to a base-taste layer of meat rub. Seal the deal with a pro-style smokestack of applewood, hickory, and mesquite wood chips. Open up the pit with the Pit Master Crate, and unlock the secrets of True Barbecue. We’ve got fun diabolical wrapping options for every occasion. Add one during checkout to make his gift extra special!

title: Ultimate Popcorn Making Crate
Description: Story What’s Poppin’?Popcorn purists know that, on a molecular level, each and every kernel creates a literal explosion of flavor in their mouth. Of course, you don’t have to be a snack scientist to appreciate the perfection of popcorn. You can also just be…you know…really hungry.With a quality microwaveable popper, a pair of tasty gourmet popcorn flavors, and a bunch of scrumptious seasonings and salts, this gift is set to elevate popcorn to its rightful spot in the pantheon of America’s greatest snacks. Whether he prefers his pops buttered or salted, he can enjoy the bold flavors of gourmet popcorn right in his living room. Fill his popper with flavor and make his snack time even butter…er...better with the Ultimate Popcorn Making Crate!Flavor Factoids: This dishwasher safe, microwave popcorn popper includes built-in measuring guides, and is the perfect way to prepare his favorite snack, no oil required. Sweet, savory, and a little spicy, too, the kettle corn, jalapeno cheddar seasoning, garlic parmesan, and ranch seasonings let everyone customize their popcorn. Turn his living room into a private theater with fun popcorn bags that’ll have the whole family talking…but hopefully not during the movie.

title: Chef's Cleaver Knife Making Kit
Description: Story Cleave-Ho! Like any art form, cooking meat requires the proper tools. You’d never see Michelangelo chiseling with a jackhammer or Burt Reynolds trimming his mustache with safety scissors, so why should a maestro of meats use anything less than the best? And if he can build the best with his own two hands? Well, that’s an art form all its own. Featuring a ready-to-shape, stabilized cactus wood handle and a stunningly sharp 7” Damascus cleaver blade, this unique project kit is simply a cut above the rest. With a quality bench vise, rasp and file set, and a bevy of other tools, he’ll be well-equipped to build a blade so sharp, the meat might just carve itself in fear. Upgrade his culinary cutlery, and sharpen his skills to perfection with the Chef's Cleaver Knife Making Kit! NOTE: Chef's Cleaver Knife Making Kit does not ship in a crate.Make his gift extra special by adding our "Diabolical Duct Tape Cocoon" wrapping experience at Checkout for even more fun!

title: Wooden RC Car Kit
Description: Story All Vroom, Less RoomBuilding a car from the ground up is a rite of passage for many men…if they’re starring in a popular 90’s sitcom. For the rest of us, it’s expensive, time consuming, and takes up way too much space...at least it used to.Scratch his fix-it itch with the DIY Wooden RC Car Kit. From the steel axles and drive rod, to the full-wooden frame and suspension system, this kit has everything he’ll need to build a super-speedy RC Car from the ground up. No garage required.Fuel his creative tank, and rev up his excitement engines with the DIY Wooden RC Car Kit.Speed Bumps: When fully assembled, this RC car can hit speeds up to 30 mph. When disassembled, it’s pretty slow. A rechargeable lithium ion battery ensures hours of RC fun. The included remote control and receiver make agile handling a breeze, no matter the road conditions. Comes with all the hardware he’ll need and a detailed instruction booklet that’ll have him putting the proverbial pedal to the metal in no time. Each of the over 100 wooden pieces has been laser cut for maximum precision and easy assembly.

title: The Bacon Crate
Description: Story We Love You, Bacon"Love" is a strong word that's sometimes hard for men to say. Entangling, complicated emotional loops in our male brains can choke us up when we're trying to form that simple syllable, unless the next word is "Bacon".There is no easier, more joyous pronouncement for us to make than to declare, unequivocally, that we love bacon. 50 Shades of BaconWhat if we told you bacon doesn't have to just be a staple at breakfast? In sweet and spicy jerky form, bacon can be a portable, dangerously habit-forming companion at your fingertips, 24/7. Better yet, with a sprinkle of savory seasoning, you can transform all non-bacon foods into their final, most flavorful form. Carry bacon wherever you go.

title: Beard Wrangler Mini Crate
Description: Story It's Just A Beard... There's no denying the beard has become the top face accessory of the twenty-first century. Beards currently sit atop the mythos of masculinity right next to Zeus and Chuck Norris, both of which are only there because of their beards. But with this widespread reverence for rugged-chic has come a good deal of bad science about the benefits of beard growth. We're here to temper expectations and set the record straight: Things Beards Will Not Do: Make you utterly irresistible Qualify you as an expert on politics, the economy, philosophy, etc... Fell trees with a single stare Legally serve as a motorcycle license Things Beards Will Do: Look good sometimes Become dry and itchy Smell, not necessarily good Store crumbs for 'future face-follicle foraging' Wash under waterfalls photogenically Clean, Sheen, Facial Hygiene Beards are natural; the most natural conclusion of the male condition. But some beards in their natural state look like a tangled monstrosity that could've been pulled out of a shower drain or coughed up by the neighborhood stray. Our Beard Wrangler Crate rears even the most unyielding beards into their most presentable, pro-scentable form whilst still preserving the beard's rebellious strength and spirit. We've included a shave towel which works for its exact opposite-stated purpose, and a boar-bristled brush that's excels in hair care because it is hair. Plus all the necessary tools to wrangle it all in including a beard bib, comb and scissors. The beard doesn't make the man, but it is a literal extension of the man. Give some polish and poise to the furriest of face friends with the Beard Wrangler Mini Crate.

title: Whiskey Nuts Decanter
Description: Story Getting NuttyYou’d think improving the beer nut would be simple, but it turns out they’re already pretty perfect. They’re snackable by the handful, quick to down between drinks, and just the right amount of salty. So how’d we make the world’s-greatest snack even better? We added booze, of course.We’ve filled a classy, glassy whiskey decanter with assorted nuts generously soaked in quality whiskey, for the tastiest and most efficient home-bar accessory on the market. When he’s done snacking, just refill the decanter with whiskey for a gift that keeps on giving. Upgrade his bar game with these deliciously boozy, more-than-ordinary whiskey nuts.

title: Slaughterhouse Crate
Description: Story Have A Meat Emergency? You just spent Thanksgiving at your vegan in-laws' house. You did things you told yourself you never would, things you'll probably never forget. Maybe for a moment, you were almost fooled by the yeast gravy and tofu turkey. But you survived. Come back to us. Dial in the Slaughterhouse Crate for an immediate and full recovery of your carnivorous manhood. Over 1 Pound Of BeefWe'll ship you the best eight bags of jerky we could find in all the land, delicious meats spanning a range of flavor profiles. Most experienced tasters will develop a preference for either a sweet or spicy base- this crate is crafted with a broad sampling sure to please all palates and start you on your journey towards jerky expertise. Of course, the cuts of meat matter as much as the marinades and spices. If you've been gnawing on the run-of-the-mill, off-the-shelf beef leather they hawk at convenience stores, then these packs will teach you what your jerky should deliver: tender cuts of lean beef aged perfectly.

title: Jerky Heart
Description: Story Taste the LoveIt’s not that men don’t get romance…it’s just that, for a lot of them, a tub of bubbles and rose petals doesn’t really get their blood pumping. But the tides of affection are turning, and the romanced man now has an even stronger champion in the tantalizingly tender Jerky Heart!When it comes to relationships, there’s nothing harder than showing him what’s in your heart…unless what’s in your heart is a bunch of magnificently meaty jerky bites! From Whiskey Maple to Root Beer Habanero, this collection packs enough tender love to make his stomach swoon with scandalously savory flavor.Put the “man” back in romance and charm him in his truest, tastiest love language with the Jerky Heart! Make his gift extra special by adding our "Diabolical Duct Tape Cocoon" wrapping experience at Checkout for even more fun!

title: Booze-Infused Jerky Crate
Description: Story Cowcaholics A-nom-nom-nonymous Alcohol affects people differently: some become more talkative, some funnier, and some friskier, but when it comes to cows, alcohol just makes them more delicious...and maybe also friskier. We’re not sure how they’re getting their buzz on—perhaps they’re grazing on fermented veggies or maybe their hooves have evolved to open bottles—but we do know “Cowcaholism” on the range is as widespread as it is utterly hilarious. If you thought cow-tipping was funny, imagine “cow-tipsying,” where a one-ton, hot mess of a cow topples over of its own drunken accord. The fall of such docile beasts have given rise to our stampede of inebriated beef, the Booze-Infused Jerky Crate. A cow walks into a bar... By weight, the average-sized cow can down 57 standard drinks per hour (almost 1 per minute) and still be within the legal limits of operating a vehicle or motorized tractor. At maximum capacity, the average cow’s four stomachs can hold upwards of 62 gallons of liquid, more than a barrel of Jack Daniels (53 gallons). If only that were enough alcohol to satiate their demons. The good news is, this means the tender beef of the Booze-Infused Jerky Crate has been marinating in a saloon’s worth of alcohol (from the inside-out) for the better half of a bovine lifetime. The results, delicious, buzzed beef jerky. Go home beef jerky, you’re drunk. We didn’t just cure the easy-capture, beer-bellied beef bodies, we’ve herded up cows with diversified tastes from Whiskey Straight to Rum or a wide spectrum of alcohol flavors for your jerky fix. The full lineup of cattle intoxication includes: Whiskey Sausage, California Wine, Chipotle Tequila, and Caribbean Rum to act as a quick brunch/hangover cure. Throwdown a double-shot of beef and booze in one bite with the Booze-Infused Jerky Crate.

title: Advent of Love Jerky Calendar
Description: Story Tender Reminders Let’s face it: guys are notoriously bad at remembering important dates. Anniversaries, birthdays, holidays—sometimes they just sneak up on you. But fear not! The Advent of Love Jerky Calendar is here to save the day (or days) and make counting down to those special moments fun and delicious. And what better way to do that than with nearly a month’s worth of ridiculously delicious, marinated meats?Each of the twenty-five windows holds a small piece of jerky that will remind him of the milestone ahead. From Honey Bourbon to Habanero BBQ, every day reveals a new savory surprise. And with every bite, he'll think of you and the special moment you’re counting down to together.Whether he’s remembering to take out the trash or counting down to a sentimental milestone, this calendar will keep him on track with tasty tidbits of joy. Because let's be real, the way to a man's memory is through his stomach. Forget a string around his finger; give him jerky in his mouth!

title: Rib Master Crate
Description: Story Dibs on the Ribs!Contrary to popular belief, mastering ribs requires more than just a sauce bib and an empty belly. title: Sliced Prosciutto & Provolone Tray
Description: Experience the quintessential Italian pairing with our expertly prepared Sliced Prosciutto and Provolone Tray from Di Bruno Bros. This ready-to-serve selection brings together two pillars of Italian culinary tradition, offering an effortless way to enjoy a sophisticated appetizer or enhance your favorite dishes. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 4 oz. The Flavor Experience Our tray features delicate, paper-thin slices of authentic Prosciutto, slow-cured to perfection for a minimum of 400 days. This meticulous aging process results in its signature sweet, salty, and subtly nutty flavor, along with a melt-in-your-mouth texture. Complementing the prosciutto is our premium Provolone cheese, known for its mild, milky taste and smooth, semi-firm texture. Whether you prefer a younger, sweeter Provolone or a slightly sharper, aged variety, this tray offers the perfect balance to the rich prosciutto. Usage Tips The Di Bruno Bros. Sliced Prosciutto and Provolone Tray makes it a breeze to enjoy a classic Italian pairing. For effortless entertaining, simply present the ready-to-serve prosciutto and Provolone on a platter as an instant antipasto, or get creative by wrapping the delicate prosciutto around sweet melon or crisp grissini. Beyond appetizers, this versatile duo shines in everyday meals: layer them generously into gourmet sandwiches or warm panini with a drizzle of olive oil, toss them into fresh green salads for a savory boost, or even drape the prosciutto over a hot pizza fresh from the oven for an authentic Italian finish. This convenient tray brings the taste of Italy right to your table, perfect for any occasion.

title: Sliced Prosciutto Large Tray
Description: Our expertly sliced prosciutto is ready to be the star of your next antipasto platter or the perfect addition to a crowd-pleasing charcuterie board. The Prosciutto di Parma we select is aged for a minimum of 18 months, giving it a rich, savory flavor and a tender texture that melts in your mouth. Each slice is hand-placed to showcase its delicate marbling and beautiful color. This generous, shareable tray is ideal for entertaining. Layer it with fresh mozzarella, drape it over ripe melon, or serve it alongside our aged Parmigiano Reggiano. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 16 oz. The Flavor Experience his paper-thin prosciutto is a symphony of flavor and texture. Each slice is a masterpiece, cured to perfection in the cool, dry air of Parma, Italy. As you take a bite, the delicate meat melts in your mouth, releasing a subtle sweetness that's balanced by a hint of salt. You'll notice nutty undertones from the pigs' diet of chestnuts and whey from Parmigiano Reggiano production, adding a rich, complex dimension to the flavor. Usage Tips Craft a stunning charcuterie board with this paper-thin prosciutto. Its delicate, savory flavor pairs perfectly with a range of accompaniments. For a classic sweet and salty combination, drape slices over fresh melon or figs. The prosciutto's nuanced flavor, with its subtle sweetness and hints of salt, also shines alongside aged cheeses like Parmigiano Reggiano or a creamy burrata. You can also layer it into a panini with mozzarella and sun-dried tomatoes or toss torn pieces into a simple pasta dish for a quick, elegant meal. Whether you're a connoisseur or a newcomer, these versatile slices make every meal feel a little more special.

title: Pecorino Romano
Description: A hard, salty Italian cheese made from 100% sheep's milk. With a history dating back over 2,000 years, this cheese was a staple for Roman legionaries and is a crown jewel of Italian sheep milk cheeses. It is a Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) product, a certification given to cheeses that are produced in specific regions of Italy and adhere to traditional methods. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 7 oz. The Flavor Experience When you taste Ambrosi Pecorino Romano, you're immediately greeted by a powerful, salty tang that defines its character. The initial burst of saltiness quickly gives way to a complex and savory depth. You might detect notes of lanolin and a subtle grassy sweetness, a direct reflection of the sheep's milk from which it's made. The texture is firm and granular, with a satisfying crumble that dissolves on the tongue. As it melts, a nutty, sharp finish lingers, leaving a desire for another bite Usage Tips Ambrosi Pecorino Romano is a versatile cheese whose sharp, salty profile makes it an excellent star ingredient or a flavorful finishing touch. It's the essential cheese for classic Roman pasta dishes like cacio e pepe, carbonara, and amatriciana, where its finely grated texture and robust flavor create creamy, delicious sauces. Beyond pasta, it can be grated over soups, stews, risottos, and roasted vegetables as a substitute for Parmesan, adding a sharper, saltier kick. On a charcuterie board, its bold flavor pairs wonderfully with olives, cured meats, or even a drizzle of honey or balsamic glaze for a perfect balance of savory and sweet. You can also shave it over salads to add a tangy bite or even simmer the rind in broths to infuse them with a deep, savory flavor.

title: Millenials Provolone Piccante
Description: Millenials Provolone Piccante is a semi-hard, spun-paste cheese crafted from cow's milk and aged for 6-12 months. This traditional Italian cheese is renowned for its pleasantly sharp and spicy flavor, a characteristic of the "piccante" style. Unlike the mild, younger "dolce" provolone, the "piccante" variety develops a more robust and piquant taste as it ages, making it a favorite for those who appreciate a cheese with a little extra bite. Its firm texture is still relatively smooth, and it melts beautifully, making it a highly versatile cheese for both cooking and snacking Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 7 oz. The Flavor Experience As you take a bite of Millenials Provolone Piccante, you'll first notice its firm, smooth texture, which gives way to a satisfying chew. The initial flavor is a rich, buttery sweetness, a characteristic of the high-quality cow's milk. But this sweetness is a prelude to a delightful surprise—a pleasant, spicy sharpness that builds on the palate. The "piccante" quality isn't overwhelming; rather, it's a zesty, piquant finish that lingers without being aggressively hot. The taste is complex, with nutty and savory notes that deepen as the cheese melts on your tongue. It's a flavor experience that is both familiar and exciting, offering more character than its mild counterpart. Usage Tips Millenials Provolone Piccante is a wonderfully versatile cheese that excels in both cooking and on a cheese board. Its excellent melting properties make it perfect for adding a sharp, flavorful kick to sandwiches, pizzas, and baked pasta dishes. For a classic Italian sub or hoagie, thinly sliced Provolone Piccante provides the ideal spicy and savory counterpoint to cured meats. It's also the perfect cheese for a gourmet grilled cheese sandwich, where it creates a satisfyingly gooey and piquant interior. Beyond sandwiches, consider grating it over salads or pasta for an extra layer of flavor. On a cheese board, serve it in small cubes or wedges alongside olives, roasted red peppers, or a sweet fig jam to balance its sharp notes.

title: Famous 4th Street Ultimate Tower American Classic Cookies
Description: An assortment of rich, buttery, and sweet cookies, brownies, and chocolate covered pretzels crafted with the finest ingredients. Please note this item ships separately. Your tower includes: 12 Classic Brownies 18 Chocolate Chip Cookies 6 Oatmeal Raisin Cookies 6 Sugar Cookies 6 Snickerdoodle Cookies 12 Mini Oatmeal Raisin Cookies The Flavor ExperienceSalty, sweet, buttery, nutty AeAe the sensations are endless with this state-of-the-art cookie tower. Baked to perfection for the perfect moist, chewy texture. The StoryWith multiple locations between PA and the Jersey Shore, The Famous 4th Street Cookie Company has been thriving for over 40 years, using the same award-winning family recipe for chewy, thick, fresh cookies. Homemade with all-natural ingredients AeAe no preservatives, artificial flavorings or colors of any kind.

title: Prosciutto-Stuffed Pepper Shooters
Description: Generously stuffed with Provolone and Prosciutto di Parma, our fiery homemade cherry poppers are a uniquely hearty treat that are ideal for snacking or as an addition to your next antipasti. The Flavor Experience Anyone who has stood in line at our 9th Street store deep in the heart of Philadelphia’s Italian Market can testify to the popularity of Di Bruno Bros. Homemade Cherry Poppers, but you can now bask in their glory without having to wait. Cherry peppers are stuffed with Provolone and Prosciutto di Parma and pack just the right amount of heat to keep you coming back to the jar for more. The Story Staples in our shops since the 1970s, Cherry Poppers have been fixtures within the Di Bruno Brother family for much of the 20th century. Born from time-honored Italian-American customs in the kitchens of aunts of Di Bruno owners, William, Billy, and Emilio Mignucci, peppers were soaked in vinegar brine and stuffed with aged provolone and prosciutto. It wasn’t long before these delectable treats were introduced to Philadelphia locals and began flying out of the barrels. Demand has insisted that a team of culinary experts take over production of these handheld delights, but we guarantee our Homemade Cherry Poppers – now generously stuffed with Cremosa provolone and Prosciutto di Parma – are still made with the same care and devotion of their creators. Usage Tips These poppers are a perfect addition to a cheese plate, as a side to a toasty panini, or as a straight up snack. Or try dicing them for one incredible sandwich relish! Quick Facts Origin: Rhode Island, United StatesUnit Size: 7 oz.

title: 6-Month Aged Asiago Cheese
Description: Asiago is a delightful medium-aged cheese exhibiting all of the flavor benefits of a much older cheese. The Flavor Experience Aged Asiago contains some really freaky tropical fruit notes (primarily pineapple with hints of guava) and an umami. What you end up with is a cheese that eats like a meal. Rich and satisfying as it hits on all of the scientific labels for taste. The Story Pre 1000 A.D., Asiago was made from cow and sheep milk. In the early 1500s, production was transitioned to all cow's milk, as sheep had a very aggressive browsing style, which made the wet area prone to landslides. Usage Tips A classic for antipasto, pair with pepperoni, olives and roasted peppers - or grate over risotto, polenta, or your favorite pasta dish to add a savory yet tangy touch. Quick Facts Origin: Italy Milk Type/Treatment: Pasteurized CowUnit Size: Wedges vary from 6-8oz.

title: Sharp Cheddar
Description: Eat cheese to do good! All Philabundance cheese sales benefit the region's largest hunger relief organization Quick Facts Origin: United States - PennsylvaniaMilk Type/Treatment: Raw CowRennet Type: Animal The Flavor Experience A hearty 60-day aged raw milk colby cheese. This sharp cheddar is delicious for cooking especially homemade macaroni and cheese! The Story We've partnered with Philabundance, an amazing local food bank and food rescue program. With Upcycle and Uplift, we're working to create nutritious food from surplus farm products. High quality products crafted with the highest ideals in mind. These cheeses are made at Sunset Farms, a small third-generation family farm with 50 dairy cows run by Jacob Bieler out in Ronks, PA. His focus on the comfort of the cows and giving them the least stressful environment possible to live in. (Lucky cows!) This quality care leads to great rBST (antibiotic) free milk, which in turn leads to delicious cheese. Usage Tips Colby cheese is one of the true American-made styles, and you can treat it similarly to a Parm or a cheddar. Treat this smoked version as if it were the cheese version of bacon - add it to a burger, enjoy it with eggs, or layer it as an extra bit of flavor in your next BLT. You could even make a mean broccoli-cheese soup with this smoky delicious cheese...

title: Bulk Hand Dipped Ricotta
Description: Country of Origin: United StatesMilk Type/Treatment: Pasteurized Cow Rennet Type: Animal

title: Bulk Stracciatella
Description: Country of Origin: United StatesMilk Type/Treatment: Pasteurized Cow Rennet Type: Animal

title: Danny & Joe's Famous Pizza Kit
Description: Craft a pizza masterpiece right in your own kitchen or send the best gift ever! Makes 2 delicious pies! Danny & Joe's Famous Pizza Kit delivers all you need attain pizza perfection. Start with delicious, perfectly balanced dough, straight-off-the-vine tomatoes and fresh mozzarella, then top off with cup and char pepperoni and roasted peppers. HERE'S A QUICK TRIP THROUGH OUR PIZZA KIT! Our pizza kit includes: Essential Baking Co. Organic Pizza Dough (2 dough balls) The key to a great pie starts in the dough. Essential Baking’s organic, non-GMO pizza dough is made with quality ingredients to ensure primo texture and primo taste. Bianco DiNapoli Crushed Tomatoes The closest thing to snatching tomatoes straight off the vine. Bianco DiNapoli’s organic crushed tomatoes pack a bright, savory flavor with a smooth yet bold, sweet yet acidic profile perfect for sauces, soups, and more! Di Bruno’s Fresh Mozzarella (1 lb!)There can only be one melty master of pizzas far and wide. Our luscious mozzarella is creamy and mild, balancing the acid from your sauce with a gentle, gooey-ness that strings from your mouth as you sink your teeth into the first bite. Di Bruno Bros. Roasted PeppersMeet the most authentic flavor in the Italian Market. Our roasted red peppers are packaged into a perfect little jar with garlic and parsley. They’re silky and smooth–easy to eat right out of the jar or use as topping for homemade pizza, hearty toast, or sharp provolone. Battistoni Cup and Char PepperoniSome may argue it’s not *really* pizza until pepperoni is in the mix. Add a few slices (or the whole bag) to your pie for a pop of spicy garlic and black pepper. These artisanal New York-style slices use collagen casing for a heartier bite than those store-bought varieties. White Gold Parmigiano FlakesJackpot! These salty treasures are the pop of flavor every pizza craves. Sprinkle as a final touch or let it cook and lets golden goodness to your masterpiece pie. Usage TipsAllow dough to sit for a half-hour (if refrigerated) or four hours (if frozen) to have its texture primed for rolling.

title: Venchi Milk Chocolate Hazelnut
Description: Enjoy this creamy milk chocolate bar flavored with whole hazelnuts. Flavor Experience This 100g milk chocolate bar is a classic, distinguished by its minimum of 30% whole hazelnuts sourced exclusively from the region. The inclusion of whole hazelnuts intensifies the satisfying combination of creamy milk chocolate and the characteristic Piedmont hazelnut flavor. The Story Since 1878, Silviano Venchi began making chocolate from a small Turin village which grew into a global phenomenon. With over 145 years of history, Venchi brings the Italian way of life and delicious tastes worldwide. Venchi has a variety of chocolates and sweet treats, ranging from classic pralines and creamy truffles to rich chocolate bars, decadent spreads, and artisanal gelato. Usage Tips Try this creamy chocolate bar on its own, a delicious and nutty treat! Quick Facts Origin: New York, United States Unit Size: 3.52 oz

title: Subarashii Kudamono Dried Asian Pears
Description: Enjoy a sweat and healthy treat, in a petite gift size. The Flavor Experience Naturally sweet, chewy, and healthy! These dried Asian Pears are sun-ripened and hand-picked each Fall. Each bite of the chewy fruit releases a subtle honeyed aroma. Gluten-free and packed with fiber, these small Asian Pears deliver a refreshing sweetness! The Story Asian pears blend beauty and flavor. Inspired by their taste in Japan, Joel and Ruth Spira cultivated these pears in Eastern Pennsylvania into American-style Asian Pear varieties, further evolving the Asian Pears into what we call Subarashii Kudamono "wonderful fruit." Pairing Tips Perfect with aged Cheddar, fudgy blues, or creamy brie-style cheeses. Throw onto a freshly chopped salad or make your own snack mix! Quick Facts Origin: Pennsylvania, United States Unit Size: 4.2 oz

title: Midnight Moon
Description: Dense and smooth with a satisfying crunch. The goat cheese for people who think they don't like goat cheese. The Flavor Experience Sweet, but more of a lactic sweetness than the typical caramel sweetness found in cow milk Goudas. Brown butter tones carry on and on and on, before leaving the palate with a clean finish. The Story Produced in Holland exclusively for Cypress Grove in Humboldt County, California, Midnight Moon perfectly unites the Dutch expertise of Gouda-making with Cypress Grove's otherworldly penchant for fine goat cheese. The result is sublime. We love to suggest this to customers who claim they don't like goat cheese, because it is so different from the fresh, tart flavor we have come to expect from chevre. Usage Tips Pair with a Belgian Tripel style, like Victory Golden Monkey. Zinfandel, Syrah and dessert wines are lovely partners as well, and consider fig jam for something non-alcoholic. Quick Facts Country of Origin: CaliforniaMilk Type/Treatment: Pasteurized GoatRennet Type: Vegetarian Rennet

title: Prosciutto & Mozzarella Duet
Description: This elegant ready-to-enjoy offering features delicate, thinly sliced prosciutto nestled alongside creamy, fresh mozzarella. The sweet, savory notes of our premium cured ham beautifully complement the mild, milky richness of the mozzarella, creating a harmonious and utterly satisfying flavor combination. Perfectly portioned and ready to serve, it's an ideal addition to any antipasto board, a sophisticated snack, or a delightful gourmet sandwich component. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 5 oz. The Flavor Experience With your first bite, the silky, melt-in-your-mouth prosciutto delivers a delicate balance of sweetness and savory depth, hinting at its careful curing. This elegant flavor is then beautifully softened and enhanced by the cool, and milky creaminess of the mozzarella. The two components intertwine perfectly, creating a harmonious, clean, and truly satisfying taste that celebrates the simple yet profound pleasure of classic Italian flavors. Usage Tips This ready-to-enjoy duet is perfect for effortless entertaining or a delightful snack. For a simple yet elegant appetizer, arrange the rolled duets on a platter, perhaps with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil and a sprinkle of freshly cracked black pepper, or a few basil leaves. It's an ideal addition to any antipasto spread or charcuterie board, pairing beautifully with olives, roasted red peppers, or crusty Italian bread. You can also slide these duets into sandwiches or paninis for a quick and gourmet lunch, or gently chop them to add a rich, creamy, and savory element to a fresh salad. For optimal flavor and texture, let the duet come to room temperature for about 15-20 minutes before serving.

title: Frutto D'Italia Castelvetrano Olives Green, 6.7-Ounce Jar
Description: These olives will have you feeling like you are snacking on the a Sicilian shore. QUICK FACTS Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 10.6 oz THE FLAVOR EXPERIENCE Castelvetrano olives grow on the western coast of Sicily and are little, round and crisp with a unique fruity flavor. THE STORY Originating in their small rural village of Castel Madama, the Mancini family began drying and selling olives at the local market. Today, their olives and quality preserves can be found all over the globe. USAGE TIPS Add Castelvetrano olives to any pasta salad for an extra pop of flavor.

title: Mild Soppressata Sliced Coin Pack
Description: An Italian classic! Rustic, sweet, savory and sliced to be served. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 6 oz. The Flavor Experience Our Mild Soppressata is an Italian classic—rustic and savory. Usage Tips Indulge in a truly exceptional charcuterie experience by pairing this salami with sharp Italian cheeses and creamy domestic farmstead varieties. Whether you're creating a meat plate for the ages or simply snacking, this salami is a must-have addition. For the perfect combination, try it with our house provolone and private label Fig & Acacia Honey Jam.

title: Soppressata & Mozzarella Roll Duets
Description: We meticulously hand-roll slices of robust, savory soppressata around a core of creamy, fresh mozzarella. The spicy, rich notes of the cured sausage beautifully complement the mild, milky sweetness of the cheese, creating a harmonious and utterly satisfying bite. Ready to slice and serve, this roll is a perfect, effortless addition to any antipasto platter, a sophisticated snack, or a delightful gourmet sandwich component. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 5 oz. The Flavor Experience As you take a bite, your palate is first greeted by the bold, peppery kick and rich, savory depth of the soppressata, hinting at its careful curing. This robust flavor is then beautifully cushioned by the cool, milky, and exquisitely creamy freshness of the mozzarella. The interplay is a delightful dance: the spice and assertiveness of the soppressata are perfectly mellowed by the gentle, soothing creaminess of the cheese, creating a balanced, satisfying, and authentically Italian taste that lingers pleasantly on the tongue. Usage Tips This ready-to-enjoy roll is incredibly versatile for effortless entertaining or a quick gourmet treat. For an elegant appetizer, simply slice it into thin rounds and arrange on a platter, perhaps garnished with a few fresh basil leaves. It makes a fantastic addition to any charcuterie or antipasto board, pairing wonderfully with olives, roasted red peppers, and crusty bread. You can also incorporate slices into paninis or sandwiches for an elevated lunch, or even chop it to toss into a simple pasta salad for an extra layer of flavor. For the best taste and texture, always allow the roll to come to room temperature for about 15-20 minutes before serving.

title: Sliced Chorizo
Description: Embrace the bold, smoky essence of Spain with our thinly sliced Chorizo, now available for your culinary adventure Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 4 oz. The Flavor Experience Crafted from premium pork, expertly seasoned with a vibrant blend of smoked paprika, garlic, and other traditional spices, our chorizo is cured to perfection, delivering an unforgettable depth of flavor. Each delicate slice showcases the chorizo's characteristic ruby-red hue and irresistible marbling, promising a tender bite with every piece Usage Tips Our pre-sliced chorizo offers unparalleled versatility, making it a staple for both quick snacks and elaborate meals. For an instant Spanish flair, enjoy it directly from the package, perhaps alongside some of our artisanal cheeses, crusty bread, and briny olives for a delightful charcuterie board. To elevate hot dishes, gently sauté the slices in a pan until slightly crispy; this will render out its flavorful, paprika-infused oil, which can then be used as a base for paellas, stews, scrambled eggs, or pasta sauces, infusing every bite with its bold, smoky essence. You can also layer these convenient slices onto pizzas, flatbreads, or sandwiches for a rich, savory kick, or even crisp them up and crumble over salads for added texture and a burst of flavor. Remember, sliced chorizo is an ideal ingredient for building deep, complex flavors in countless culinary creations.

title: Salchichon, Jamon, and Chorizo Tray
Description: Di Bruno Bros. Spanish Charcuterie Tray: A Taste of España Transport your taste buds to the sun-drenched hills of Spain with the Di Bruno Bros. Spanish Charcuterie Tray, a meticulously curated selection of three iconic cured meats. Perfect for entertaining, gifting, or a sophisticated self-indulgence, this tray showcases the authentic flavors and artisanal traditions of Spanish charcuterie. The Flavor Experience From the moment you open the Di Bruno Bros. Spanish Charcuterie Tray, you're invited on a curated journey of authentic Spanish flavors. First, the Salchichón offers a refined introduction, its delicate, lean texture and subtle notes of black peppercorn providing a clean, sophisticated start. Next, the paper-thin slices of Jamon Serrano melt on your tongue, releasing a complex symphony of nutty, savory, and perfectly salted goodness—the very essence of Spain's famed cured ham. Finally, the vibrant Chorizo awakens your palate with a lively burst of smoky paprika and rich pork, delivering a satisfying warmth and bold character that perfectly balances the collection. Together, these three iconic meats create a harmonious and unforgettable tasting experience, a true celebration of Spanish culinary artistry. Usage Tips To get the most out of your Spanish Charcuterie Tray, always bring it to room temperature for 20-30 minutes before serving; this lets the flavors and aromas fully blossom. Arrange the slices artfully on a board, fanning them out or gently folding them to enhance presentation. For the perfect pairing, include some Manchego cheese, Marcona almonds, and briny olives, alongside crusty bread or crackers. A dollop of fig jam or quince paste can add a delightful sweet contrast, and a good Spanish red wine or dry Sherry will complete the experience. Any leftovers should be promptly refrigerated in an airtight container and enjoyed within 3-5 days. Beyond the board, don't hesitate to dice the chorizo for a flavorful addition to eggs or stews, or layer the jamon and salchichon in a simple, satisfying sandwich

title: Sliced Mild Soppressata
Description: Indulge in the rich, authentic flavor of our Sliced Sweet Soppressata, brought to you by Di Bruno Bros. This beloved Italian dry sausage, or salumi, is a testament to time-honored craftsmanship, offering a robust yet mild profile that’s perfect for any occasion. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 4 oz. The Flavor Experience Unlike its spicy counterpart, our Sweet Soppressata is crafted with premium, coarsely ground pork and simply seasoned with a harmonious blend of black pepper, a hint of garlic, and other select spices. It's air-cured to perfection, resulting in a firm, slightly chewy texture and a complex, savory aroma that will transport your senses straight to the sun-drenched hills of Southern Italy. Each carefully cut slice reveals beautiful marbling, showcasing the quality of the lean cuts of pork used. Usage Tips Our Sweet Soppressata Sliced is a versatile and flavorful addition to any spread. Its robust yet mild character makes it ideal for building an impressive charcuterie board, where it pairs beautifully with aged provolone, creamy burrata, and a selection of olives and fig jam. Elevate your sandwiches and paninis by layering slices with roasted red peppers, fresh mozzarella, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze on crusty bread. For a simple yet elegant antipasto, wrap the soppressata around melon slices or serve alongside marinated artichoke hearts. You can also chop it into larger pieces to toss into a hearty pasta salad or a rustic frittata for added depth. And of course, it’s always perfect for direct snacking, offering a satisfying and authentically Italian bite on its own or with a glass of your favorite red wine.

title: Cheese Storage Bags
Description: Keep your cheese fresher for longer with these convenient and storage bags. Crafted from a breathable material, these bags allow your cheese to breathe while maintaining ideal moisture levels to prevent drying out. Perfect for a quick and easy cleanup of cheese leftovers, these bags also make a thoughtful gift. Each package contains fifteen 6.25" x 11" cheese bags. Each case contains twenty packages. The Story: Mark Goldman, a cheese enthusiast, founded Formaticum in 2006 with the idea of providing other fromage fiends a better way to store their favorite wedges at home. As he says, the packaging "Not only looks good, but protects flavor and allows for proper oxygen exchange, letting cheese breathe. After all, cheese is alive. Let's not suffocate it and let it spoil before we can eat it." Formaticum works directly with European manufacturers to provide the same quality and materials used by the finest European cheesemakers with an emphasis on being eco-friendly.

title: Diced Prosciutto
Description: Diced prosciutto consists of small, ready-to-use cubes of prosciutto, which is an uncooked, unsmoked, and dry-cured Italian ham. Unlike its thinly sliced counterpart, which is often draped and served raw, diced prosciutto is typically intended for cooking to release its concentrated flavors and alter its texture. Quick Facts Origin: ItalyUnit Size: 4 oz. The Flavor Experience It carries the signature salty taste inherent in dry-cured meats, but it's balanced by a surprising sweetness that develops during the long aging process. There's a profound umami depth, a result of the concentrated pork flavor, and often a subtle, nutty undertone. Because it's unsmoked, the pure essence of the cured ham shines through, free from any smoky interference. Usage Tips When incorporated into hot dishes, the rendered fat and crisped meat infuse the entire dish with a rich, aromatic, and deeply satisfying flavor that is both delicate and assertive. It's an ideal ingredient for building flavor in sauces, soups, stews, or for adding a salty, sweet, and textural counterpoint to vegetables, pasta, or eggs.

title: Large Leaf Board Liners
Description: This large grape leaf board liners are biodegradable and are made on wax-coated parchment paper. These eco-friendly cheese liners are reusable and will add a touch of rustic elegance to your next cheese or charcuterie board. Each package contains twenty leaves. Large liners measure 7" x 7" The Story: Mark Goldman, a cheese enthusiast, founded Formaticum in 2006 with the idea of providing other fromage fiends a better way to store their favorite wedges at home. As he says, the packaging "Not only looks good, but protects flavor and allows for proper oxygen exchange, letting cheese breathe. After all, cheese is alive. Let's not suffocate it and let it spoil before we can eat it." Formaticum works directly with European manufacturers to provide the same quality and materials used by the finest European cheesemakers with an emphasis on being eco-friendly.
